<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	would cause the application of the laws of any jurisdiction other than the internal laws of the State of California to the rights and duties of the parties. Should any provision of the Plan be
	determined by a court of law to be illegal or unenforceable, such provision shall be enforced to the fullest extent allowed by law and the other provisions shall nevertheless remain effective and shall remain enforceable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	19
</P>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_4>

	Exhibit 4.15
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 3 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIS AMENDMENT NO. 3, dated as of June&nbsp;19, 2015 (this &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), by and among TEXTAINER LIMITED
	(&#147;
<B>
<I>
	TL
</I>
</B>
	&#148; or the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Borrower
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), a company with limited liability organized under the laws of Bermuda, TEXTAINER GROUP HOLDINGS LIMITED (the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Guarantor&#146;&#146;
</I>
</B>
	), a company with limited
	liability organized under the laws of Bermuda, the financial institutions listed on the signature pages hereof under the headings &#147;LENDERS&#148; (each a &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Lender
</I>
</B>
	&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Lenders
</I>
</B>
	&#148;),
	or &#147;SWAP CONTRACT COUNTERPARTIES&#148; (each a &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Swap Contract Counterparty
</I>
</B>
	&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Swap Contract Counterparties
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), and BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., as administrative agent for the
	Lenders (in such capacity, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Administrative Agent
</I>
</B>
	&#148;) and L/C Issuer, is made to the Credit Agreement (as defined below).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	WITNESSETH:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the
	Borrower, the Guarantor, the Lenders and the Administrative Agent are parties to a Credit Agreement, dated as of September&nbsp;24, 2012 (as amended by Amendment Number 1 to Credit Agreement and Security Agreement, dated as of July&nbsp;25, 2013,
	and Consent and Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement and Security Agreement, dated as of April&nbsp;30, 2014, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Credit Agreement
</I>
</B>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the parties desire to amend the Credit Agreement in order to modify certain provisions thereof; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the Required Lenders have agreed to such amendment of the Credit Agreement, subject to the terms and conditions hereof;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and mutual covenants herein contained, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;1 Definitions; Interpretation
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<B>
	Terms Defined in Credit Agreement
</B>
	. All capitalized terms used in this Amendment (including in the recitals hereof) and not
	otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Credit Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
	. The rules of
	interpretation set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.02
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement shall be applicable to this Amendment and are incorporated herein by this reference.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;2 Amendments to the Credit Agreement
</B>
	. Pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;11.01
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement, the Credit Agreement is hereby
	amended as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<U>
	Schedule 2.01
</U>
	is hereby deleted and replaced with
<U>
	Schedule 2.01
</U>
	attached hereto as
<U>
	Exhibit
	A
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) The definition of &#147;
<B>
	Term Facility
</B>
	&#148; is hereby deleted and all references to &#147;
<B>
	Term Facility
</B>
	&#148; in
	the Credit Agreement are hereby replaced with &#147;
<B>
	Segregated Collateral Pool Debt
</B>
	&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.01
</B>
	of the
	Credit Agreement is hereby amended as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) The following new defined terms are hereby added to Section&nbsp;1.01 in the
	appropriate alphabetical order:
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage205"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Sale Leaseback Containers
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means containers acquired by the
	Borrower from a lessee in a sale leaseback transaction whereby, simultaneously with such acquisition, such lessee leases the relevant containers from the Borrower.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Segregated Collateral Pool Debt
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means Indebtedness of the Borrower (a)&nbsp;governed by documentation
	substantially similar to the Credit Agreement and (b)&nbsp;secured by one or more Segregated Collateral Pools.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Third Amendment Effective Date
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means June&nbsp;19, 2015.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) The pricing table contained in the definition of &#147;
<B>
	Applicable Rate
</B>
	&#148; is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) The definition of &#147;
<B>
	Base Rate
</B>
	&#148; is hereby amended by adding the following language after
	&#147;(c) the Eurodollar Rate plus 1%&#148;:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;; and if the Base Rate shall be less than zero, such rate shall be deemed zero for
	purposes of this Agreement.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) Subsection (b)&nbsp;of the definition of &#147;
<B>
	Change of Control
</B>
	&#148; is hereby amended
	and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;(b) during any period of twelve (12)&nbsp;consecutive months, a majority of the
	members of the board of directors or other equivalent governing body of such Person cease to be composed of individuals (i)&nbsp;who were members of that board or equivalent governing body on the first day of such period, (ii)&nbsp;whose election or
	nomination to that board or equivalent governing body was approved by individuals referred to in clause (i)&nbsp;above constituting at the time of such election or nomination at least a majority of that board or equivalent governing body or
	(iii)&nbsp;whose election or nomination to that board or other equivalent governing body was approved by individuals referred to in clauses (i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;above constituting at the time of such election or nomination at least a majority of
	that board or equivalent governing body.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) The definition of &#147;
<B>
	Eurodollar Base Rate
</B>
	&#148; in clause (a)&nbsp;of the
	Definition of &#147;
<B>
	Eurodollar Rate
</B>
	&#148; is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
	Eurodollar Base Rate
</B>
	&#148; means the rate per annum equal to the London Interbank Offered Rate (&#147;
<U>
	LIBOR
</U>
	&#148;) or
	a comparable or successor rate which rate is approved by the Administrative Agent, as published on the applicable Bloomberg screen page (or such other commercially available source providing
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage206"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	quotations as may be designated by the Administrative Agent from time to time) at approximately 11:00 a.m., London time, two (2)&nbsp;Business Days prior to the commencement of such Interest
	Period, for Dollar deposits (for delivery on the first day of such Interest Period) with a term equivalent to such Interest Period or (ii)&nbsp;if such rate is not available at such time for any reason, the rate per annum determined by the
	Administrative Agent to be the rate at which deposits in Dollars for delivery on the first day of such Interest Period in same day funds in the approximate amount of the Eurodollar Rate Loan being made, continued or converted and with a term
	equivalent to such Interest Period would be offered by Bank of America&#146;s London Branch to major banks in the London interbank eurodollar market at their request at approximately 11:00 a.m. (London time) two (2)&nbsp;Business Days prior to the
	commencement of such Interest Period; and if the Eurodollar Base Rate shall be less than zero, such rate shall be deemed zero for purposes of this Agreement, and&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi) The definition of &#147;
<B>
	Eurodollar Base Rate
</B>
	&#148; in clause (b)&nbsp;of the Definition of &#147;
<B>

</B>
	&#148; is
	hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
	Eurodollar Base Rate
</B>
	&#148; means the rate per annum
	equal to (i)&nbsp;LIBOR or a comparable or successor rate which rate is approved by the Administrative Agent, as published on the applicable Bloomberg screen page (or such other commercially available source providing quotations as may be designated
	by the Administrative Agent from time to time) at approximately 11:00 a.m. (London time) determined two (2)&nbsp;Business Days prior to such date for Dollar deposits being delivered in the London interbank market for a term of one month commencing
	that day or (ii)&nbsp;if such rate is not available at such time for any reason, the rate per annum determined by the Administrative Agent to be the rate at which deposits in Dollars for delivery on the first day of such Interest Period in same day
	funds in the approximate amount of the Eurodollar Rate Loan being made, continued or converted and with a term equivalent to such Interest Period would be offered by Bank of America&#146;s London Branch to major banks in the London interbank
	eurodollar market at their request at the date and time of determination; and if the Eurodollar Base Rate shall be less than zero, such rate shall be deemed zero for purposes of this Agreement.&#148;
</P>

	(a)&nbsp;the United States of America, including those administered by OFAC, the U.S. State Department, the U.S. Department of Commerce, or through any existing or future Executive Order, (b)&nbsp;the United Nations Security Council, (c)&nbsp;the
	European Union, (d)&nbsp;Her Majesty&#146;s Treasury or (e)&nbsp;any other sanctions authority with authority over a Loan Party.&#148;

	&#147;
<B>
	5.20 Foreign Assets Control Regulations, Etc.
</B>
	No Loan Party or Subsidiary thereof nor, to the knowledge of the Loan Parties, any
	director, officer, employee, agent, affiliate or representative of such Loan Party or its Subsidiaries, is an individual or entity that is, or is owned or controlled by any individual or entity that is (i)&nbsp;currently the subject of any
	Sanctions, (ii)&nbsp;located, organized, residing or operating in any Designated Jurisdiction, or (iii)&nbsp;included on OFAC&#146;s List of Specially Designated nationals, HMT&#146;s Consolidated List of Financial Sanctions Targets and the
	Investment Ban List, or any similar list enforced by any other applicable sanctions authority in a jurisdiction where any Loan Party employs or contracts personnel and conducts material operations.&#148;
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage209"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	5.22 Anti-Corruption Laws.
</B>
	Each Loan Party has conducted its business in compliance
	with the United States Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, the UK Bribery Act of 2010, and other similar applicable anti-corruption legislation in other jurisdictions where any Loan Party employs or contracts personnel and conducts material
	operations, and has instituted and maintained policies and procedures designed to promote and achieve compliance with such laws.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(l)

</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following new

	&#147;
<B>
	6.17 Anti-Corruption Laws.
</B>
	Conduct its business in compliance with the United States Foreign Corrupt Practices Act
	of 1977, the UK Bribery Act of 2010, and other similar applicable anti-corruption legislation in other jurisdictions where any Loan Party employs or contracts personnel and conducts material operations, and maintain policies and procedures designed
	to promote and achieve compliance with such laws.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(m)

	Section&nbsp;7.14
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and
	restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	7.14 Prepayments, Etc. of Indebtedness.
</B>
	Prepay, redeem, purchase, defease or
	otherwise satisfy prior to the scheduled maturity thereof in any manner, or make any payment in violation of any subordination terms of, any Indebtedness with a stated maturity later than the Maturity Date, except (a)&nbsp;the prepayment of Credit
	Extensions in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, (b)&nbsp;regularly scheduled or required repayments, prepayments or redemptions of Indebtedness set forth in
<B>
	Schedule 5.05
</B>
	, and (c)&nbsp;repayments and prepayments of the Segregated
	Collateral Pool Debt;
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	voluntary prepayments under subsection (c)&nbsp;above will only be permitted if at the time of such prepayment, no Default exists or would exist as a result of such prepayment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(n)
<B>
	Article VII
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following new
<B>
	Sections 7.19 and 7.20
</B>
	at the end of such
	Article:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	7.19 Sanctions.
</B>
	Directly or indirectly, use the proceeds of any Credit Extension, or lend, contribute or otherwise
	make available such proceeds to any Subsidiary, joint venture partner or other individual or entity, to such Loan Party&#146;s knowledge, to fund any activities of or business with any individual or entity, or in any Designated Jurisdiction, that,
	at the time of such funding, is the subject of Sanctions, or in any other manner that will result in a violation by any individual or entity (including any individual or entity participating in the transaction, whether as Lender, Arranger,
	Administrative Agent, L/C Issuer, or otherwise) of Sanctions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	7.20 Anti-Corruption Laws.
</B>
	Directly or indirectly use the proceeds of
	any Credit Extension for any purpose which would breach the United States Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, the UK Bribery Act of 2010, and other similar applicable anti-corruption legislation in other jurisdictions where any Loan Party employs
	or contracts personnel and conducts material operations.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby
	amended and restated in its entirety as follows:
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	6
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage210"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) In the event of the granting of Liens on Collateral consisting of a Segregated Collateral
	Pool to secure the Segregated Collateral Pool Debt, the Lenders, the Administrative Agent and the L/C Issuer agree that the Secured Parties&#146; Lien on such Collateral automatically shall be released so long as (w)&nbsp;such requests for release
	may be made no more frequently than quarterly (and with respect to releases relating solely to Sale Leaseback Containers, no more frequently than monthly), (x)&nbsp;such Liens are granted in connection with establishing Segregated Collateral Pool
	Debt, or are necessary to maintain compliance with the borrowing base provisions of such Segregated Collateral Pool Debt, or the Borrower wishes to dispose of assets then included in such Segregated Collateral Pool, (y)&nbsp;the Borrower shall have
	submitted to the Administrative Agent a Borrowing Base Report demonstrating that, immediately prior to and after giving pro forma effect to any such requested release of Collateral, the Total Outstandings shall not exceed the lesser of (1)&nbsp;the
	Aggregate Commitments and (2)&nbsp;the Borrowing Base, and (z)&nbsp;except in the case of any release of Sale Leaseback Containers acquired after the Third Amendment Effective Date, the Borrower shall have submitted to the Administrative Agent a
	certificate, in form and substance satisfactory to the Administrative Agent, showing that after giving effect to such release of Collateral (as compared to the Collateral included in the Borrowing Base immediately prior to such release),
	(A)&nbsp;the Weighted Average age of the Eligible Marine Containers shall not have increased by more than one year, (B)&nbsp;the Weighted Average long term lease remaining tenor shall not have decreased by more than nine months, (C)&nbsp;the
	Weighted Average long term lease composition (as a percentage of the aggregate Borrowing Base pool of Eligible Marine Containers) shall not have decreased by more than five percentage points, (D)&nbsp;no individual customer&#146;s concentration
	percentage shall have increased by more than five percentage points, measured by net book value, and (E)&nbsp;off-hire containers composition (as a percentage of the aggregate Borrowing Base pool of Eligible Marine Containers, measured by net book
	value) shall not have increased by more than two percentage points. For purposes of this section,
<B>
<I>
	&#147;Weighted Average&#148;
</I>
</B>
	for any factor, and any group of Eligible Marine Containers, shall be based on the net book value for such
	group of Eligible Marine Containers. In such event, the Administrative Agent, on behalf of the Secured Parties, shall be deemed to have released such Collateral from the Lien of the Collateral Documents, and the Administrative Agent shall, at
	Borrower&#146;s request, within three (3)&nbsp;Business Days execute any documentation reasonably required to evidence such release.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(p)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;11.17
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	11.17 Electronic Execution of Assignments and Certain Other Documents.
</B>
	The words &#147;delivery,&#148; &#147;execute,&#148;
	&#147;execution,&#148; &#147;signed,&#148; &#147;signature,&#148; and words of like import in any Loan Document or any other document executed in connection herewith shall be deemed to include electronic signatures, the electronic matching of
	assignment terms and contract formations on electronic platforms approved by the Administrative Agent, or the keeping of records in electronic form, each of which shall be of the same legal effect, validity or enforceability as a manually executed
	signature, physical delivery thereof or the use of a paper-based recordkeeping system, as the case may be, to the extent and as provided for in any applicable Law, including the Federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, the
	New York State Electronic
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	7
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage211"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Signatures and Records Act, or any other similar state laws based on the Uniform Electronic Transactions Act; provided that notwithstanding anything contained herein to the contrary neither the
	Administrative Agent, the L/C Issuer nor any Lender is under any obligation to agree to accept electronic signatures in any form or in any format unless expressly agreed to by the Administrative Agent, the L/C Issuer or such Lender pursuant to
	procedures approved by it and provided further without limiting the foregoing, upon the request of any party, any electronic signature shall be promptly followed by such manually executed counterpart.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(q)
<B>
	Article XI
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following new
<B>
	Section&nbsp;11.21
</B>
	at the end of such
	Article:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	11.21 Appointment of Borrower.
</B>
	Each of the Loan Parties hereby appoints the Borrower to act as its agent for all
	purposes of this Agreement, the other Loan Documents and all other documents and electronic platforms entered into in connection herewith and agrees that (a)&nbsp;the Borrower may execute such documents and provide such authorizations on behalf of
	such Loan Parties as the Borrower deems appropriate in its sole discretion and each Loan Party shall be obligated by all of the terms of any such document and/or authorization executed on its behalf, (b)&nbsp;any notice or communication delivered by
	the Administrative Agent, L/C Issuer or a Lender to the Borrower shall be deemed delivered to each Loan Party and (c)&nbsp;the Administrative Agent, L/C Issuer or the Lenders may accept, and be permitted to rely on, any document, authorization,
	instrument or agreement executed by the Borrower on behalf of each of the Loan Parties.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;3 Conditions of Effectiveness
</B>
	.
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
	of this Amendment shall become effective, as of the date first above written, upon the satisfaction of the following conditions:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) The execution and delivery of this Amendment by the Borrower, the Administrative Agent and all Lenders.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) There shall not have occurred a material adverse change (a)&nbsp;in the operations, business, properties, liabilities (actual or
	contingent) or condition (financial or otherwise) of the Guarantor, the Borrower or their Subsidiaries, taken as a whole, since December&nbsp;31, 2014, (b)&nbsp;the ability of the Borrower or the Guarantor to perform its Obligations under the Loan
	Documents, (c)&nbsp;the legality, validity, binding effect or enforceability against the Borrower or Guarantor of the Loan Documents (collectively, a &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Material Adverse Effect
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), or (d)&nbsp;in the facts and information
	regarding the Borrower and Guarantor as represented to date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) The absence of any action, suit, investigation or proceeding pending or,
	to the knowledge of the Borrower or any Guarantor, threatened in any court or before any arbitrator or governmental authority that could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) The Administrative Agent shall have received a satisfactory opinion of US and Bermuda counsel to the Loan Parties and certified copies of
	resolutions or other action, incumbency certificates and/or other certificates of Responsible Officer of each Loan Party as the Administrative Agent may require evidencing the identity, authority and capacity of each Responsible Officer thereof
	authorized to act as a Responsible Officer in connection with this Amendment and the other Loan Documents to which such Loan Party is a party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) The Borrower shall have paid or caused to be paid all of the fees described in (i)&nbsp;that
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage212"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	certain fee letter, dated as of May&nbsp;21, 2015, by and among Bank of America, N.A., Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner&nbsp;&amp; Smith Incorporated, and the Borrower and (ii)&nbsp;that certain fee
	letter, dated as of the date hereof, by and among Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, and the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f) The Borrower shall have
	paid all amounts described in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;6(b)
</B>
	hereof that have been invoiced prior to the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;4 Representations and
	Warranties
</B>
	. Each Loan Party hereby represents and warrants to the Administrative Agent, the Swap Contract Counterparties and the Lenders as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Each Loan Party hereby confirms and restates, as of the date hereof, the representations and warranties made by it in
<B>
	Article V
</B>
	of
	the Credit Agreement and in the other Loan Documents. For the purposes of this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
	, any representations and warranties which relate solely to an earlier date shall not be deemed confirmed and restated as of the date hereof
	(
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	such representations and warranties shall be true, correct and complete as of such earlier date).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) This
	Amendment has been duly executed and delivered by each Loan Party. The execution, delivery and performance by each Loan Party of this Amendment is within such Loan Party&#146;s corporate powers and has been duly authorized by all necessary corporate
	or other organizational action. This Amendment and the Credit Agreement as amended hereby, and all other Loan Documents to which such Loan Party is a party constitute the legal, valid and binding obligation of such Loan Party, enforceable against
	each Loan Party that is a party thereto in accordance with its terms.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) The execution and delivery by such Loan Party of this Amendment
	and the performance by such Loan Party of this Amendment and the Credit Agreement as amended hereby will not (a)&nbsp;violate any Law, the violation of which could be reasonably expected to result in a Material Adverse Effect, (b)&nbsp;conflict with
	or result in any breach or contravention of, or the creation of any Lien under, or require any payment to be made under (i)&nbsp;any Contractual Obligation to which such Loan Party is a party or affecting such Loan Party or the Properties of such
	Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries or (ii)&nbsp;any order, injunction, writ or decree of any Governmental Authority or any arbitral award to which such Loan Party or its property is subject.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) No Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;5 Ratification.
</B>
	Except as expressly amended hereby, the Credit Agreement, the other Loan Documents and all documents, instruments and
	agreements related thereto, are hereby ratified and confirmed in all respects and shall continue in full force and effect. The Credit Agreement, together with this Amendment, shall be read and construed as a single agreement. All references in the
	Loan Documents to the Credit Agreement or any other Loan Document shall hereafter refer to the Credit Agreement or any other Loan Document as amended hereby. The Lenders&#146; and the Administrative Agent&#146;s execution and delivery of, or
	acceptance of, this Amendment shall not be deemed to create a course of dealing or otherwise create any express or implied duty by any of them to provide any other or further amendments, consents or waivers in the future.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;6 Miscellaneous
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<B>
	No Reliance
</B>
	. The Borrower hereby acknowledges and confirms to the Administrative Agent, the Swap Contract Counterparties and the
	Lenders that the Borrower is executing this Amendment on the basis of its own investigation and for its own reasons without reliance upon any agreement, representation, understanding or communication by or on behalf of any other Person.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<B>
	Costs and Expenses
</B>
	. The Borrower agrees to pay to the Administrative Agent on
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	9
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage213"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	demand the reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred by the Administrative Agent and its Affiliates, including the reasonable fees, charges and disbursements of counsel to the Administrative
	Agent, in connection with the preparation, negotiation, execution and delivery of this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<B>
	Binding Effect
</B>
	. This
	Amendment shall be binding upon, inure to the benefit of and be enforceable by the Borrower, the Administrative Agent, each Lender and their respective successors and assigns.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(d)
<B>
	Governing Law
</B>
	.
<B>
	THIS AMENDMENT SHALL BE GOVERNED BY, AND CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK,
	WITHOUT REGARD TO PRINCIPLES OF CONFLICTS OF LAW THAT WOULD RESULT IN THE APPLICATION OF THE LAW OF ANOTHER JURISDICTION; PROVIDED THAT SECTIONS 5-1401 AND 5-1402 OF THE NEW YORK GENERAL OBLIGATIONS LAW SHALL APPLY.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)
<B>
	Complete Agreement; Amendments
</B>
	. This Amendment, together with the other Loan Documents, contains the entire and exclusive agreement
	of the parties hereto and thereto with reference to the matters discussed herein and therein. This Amendment supersedes all prior commitments, drafts, communications, discussions and understandings, oral or written, with respect thereto. This
	Amendment may not be modified, amended or otherwise altered except in accordance with the terms of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;11.01
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such manner as to be effective and valid
	under all applicable laws and regulations. If, however, any provision of this Amendment shall be prohibited by or invalid under any such law or regulation in any jurisdiction, it shall, as to such jurisdiction, be deemed modified to conform to the
	minimum requirements of such law or regulation, or, if for any reason it is not deemed so modified, it shall be ineffective and invalid only to the extent of such prohibition or invalidity without affecting the remaining provisions of this
	Amendment, or the validity or effectiveness of such provision in any other jurisdiction.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	. This Amendment may be
	executed in any number of counterparts and by different parties hereto in separate counterparts, each of which when so executed shall be deemed to be an original and all of which taken together shall constitute but one and the same agreement.
	Delivery of an executed counterpart of a signature page of this Amendment by facsimile or in electronic (i.e., &#147;pdf&#146; or &#147;tif&#146;) format shall be effective as delivery of a manually executed counterpart of this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h)
<B>
	Loan Documents
</B>
	. This Amendment shall constitute a Loan Document.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	[
<I>
	Signature Pages Follow
</I>
	]
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	100.000000000
</B>
</TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="BOTTOM">

	%&nbsp;
</B>

	&nbsp;
</TD>

</B>

</B>

<A NAME="eolPage220"></A>
<A NAME="D104299DEX428_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.28
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NUMBER 8
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	TO
	CREDIT AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIS AMENDMENT NUMBER 8, dated as of March&nbsp;18, 2015 (this &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), by and among TW
	CONTAINER LEASING, LTD., a company with limited liability organized under the laws of Bermuda (the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Borrower
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), the financial institutions listed on the signature pages hereof under the heading &#147;LENDERS&#148; (each a
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Lender
</I>
</B>
	&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Lenders
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), and WELLS FARGO SECURITIES LLC., as administrative agent for the Lenders (in such capacity, the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Administrative Agent
</I>
</B>
	&#148;), is made to
	the Credit Agreement (as defined below).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	WITNESSETH:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
	WHEREAS, the Borrower, the Lenders and the Administrative Agent are parties to a Credit Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;5,
	2011 (the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Credit Agreement
</I>
</B>
	&#148;);
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the parties desire to amend the Credit Agreement in order
	to modify certain provisions of the Credit Agreement; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, subject to the terms and conditions hereof, all of the Lenders have
	agreed to such amendments to the Credit Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and mutual covenants herein contained,
	the parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION 1 Definitions; Interpretation
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(a)
<B>
	Terms Defined in Credit Agreement
</B>
	. All capitalized terms used in this Amendment (including in the recitals hereof) and not
	otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Credit Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(b)
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
	. The
	rules of interpretation set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.2
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement shall be applicable to this Amendment and are incorporated herein by this reference.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION 2 Amendments to the Credit Agreement
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	(a) Amendments.
</B>
	Pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;15.12
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement, the Credit Agreement is hereby amended as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) Schedule 1 to the Credit Agreement is deleted and replaced with Schedule 1 hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) The definition of &#147;Advance Rate&#148; appearing in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Credit Agreement is amended to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<U>
	Advance Rate
</U>
	&#148;. One of the following:
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage221"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A) for each Eligible Finance Lease, ninety percent (90%); or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B) for each Eligible Owner Container, eighty percent (80%).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) Clause (c)&nbsp;of the definition of &#147;Early Amortization Event&#148; appearing in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Credit Agreement is
	hereby amended to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;(c) The Finance Lease Default Ratio (as set forth on the most recent Management
	Report) exceeds thirteen percent (13%).&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) Clause (c)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;12.1 is amended to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;(c) the Aggregate Loan Principal Balance exceeds the Asset Base on any Payment Date and the Borrower does not remedy such
	situation within ninety (90)&nbsp;days following the occurrence of such condition; provided, however, that if (x)&nbsp;such condition exists due to the occurrence of a Defaulted Finance Lease and (y)&nbsp;the Finance Lease Default Ratio is less than
	thirteen percent (13%), the period to cure such condition shall be extended from ninety (90)&nbsp;days to two hundred ten (210)&nbsp;days;&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(b)
<B>
	References Within Credit Agreement
</B>
	. Each reference in the Credit Agreement to &#147;this Agreement&#148; and the words
	&#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereunder,&#148; or words of like import, shall mean and be a reference to the Credit Agreement as amended by this Amendment.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION 3 Conditions of Effectiveness.
</B>
	The effectiveness of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
	of this Amendment shall become effective as of the date first above
	written (the &#147;
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	&#148;), upon receipt by the Administrative Agent of this Amendment duly executed and delivered by the Borrower, the Administrative Agent and all of the Lenders.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION 4 Representations and Warranties.
</B>
	To induce the Lenders to enter into this Amendment, the Borrower hereby confirms and restates, as of the date
	hereof, the representations and warranties made by it in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;7
</B>
	of the Credit Agreement and in the other Loan Documents; provided that any such representations and warranties which relate solely to an earlier date shall not be deemed
	confirmed and restated as of the date hereof (
<B>
</B>
<I>
	provided
</I>
<B>
</B>
	that such representations and warranties shall be true, correct and complete as of such earlier date).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SECTION 5 Miscellaneous
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(a)
<B>
	Notice
</B>
	. The Administrative Agent shall notify the Borrower and the Lenders of the occurrence of the Effective Date and
	promptly thereafter distribute to the Borrower and the Lenders copies of all documents delivered under
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
	of this Amendment.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(b)
<B>
	Credit Agreement Otherwise Not Affected
</B>
	. Except as expressly amended pursuant hereto, the Credit Agreement shall remain
	unchanged and in full force and effect and is hereby ratified and confirmed in all respects by the terms of this Agreement. The execution and delivery of, or acceptance of, this Amendment by the parties hereto shall not be deemed to create a course
	of dealing or otherwise create any express or implied duty by any of them to provide any other or further amendments, consents or waivers in the future. All Loans under the Credit
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage222"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Agreement that remain unpaid on the Effective Date shall remain outstanding and all other liens and encumbrances created by the terms of the Loan Documents shall remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(c)
<B>
	No Reliance
</B>
	. The Borrower hereby acknowledges and confirms to the Administrative Agent and the Lenders that the
	Borrower is executing this Amendment on the basis of its own investigation and for its own reasons without reliance upon any agreement, representation, understanding or communication by or on behalf of any other Person.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(d)
<B>
	Costs and Expenses
</B>
	. The Borrower agrees to pay to the Administrative Agent on demand the reasonable out-of-pocket expenses
	incurred by the Administrative Agent and its Affiliates, including the reasonable fees, charges and disbursements of counsel to the Administrative Agent, in connection with the preparation, negotiation, execution and delivery of this Amendment.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(e)
<B>
	Binding Effect
</B>
	. This Amendment shall be binding upon, inure to the benefit of and be enforceable by the Borrower,
	the Administrative Agent and each Lender and their respective successors and assigns.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(f)
<B>
	Governing Law
</B>
	.
<B>
	THIS
	AMENDMENT SHALL BE GOVERNED BY, AND CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(g)
<B>
	Complete Agreement;
	Amendments
</B>
	. This Amendment, together with the other Loan Documents, contains the entire and exclusive agreement of the parties hereto and thereto with reference to the matters discussed herein and therein. This Amendment supersedes all prior
	commitments, drafts, communications, discussions and understandings, oral or written, with respect thereto. This Amendment may not be modified, amended or otherwise altered except in accordance with the terms of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;15.12
</B>
	of the
	Credit Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(h)
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such
	manner as to be effective and valid under all applicable laws and regulations. If, however, any provision of this Amendment shall be prohibited by or invalid under any such law or regulation in any jurisdiction, it shall, as to such jurisdiction, be
	deemed modified to conform to the minimum requirements of such law or regulation, or, if for any reason it is not deemed so modified, it shall be ineffective and invalid only to the extent of such prohibition or invalidity without affecting the
	remaining provisions of this Amendment, or the validity or effectiveness of such provision in any other jurisdiction.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(i)
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	. This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts and by different parties hereto in separate counterparts, each of which when so executed shall be deemed to be an original and all of which taken together shall
	constitute but one and the same agreement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(j)
<B>
	Loan Document.
</B>
	This Amendment shall constitute a Loan Document.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage223"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have duly executed this Amendment, as of the date first
	above written.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	Form of Purchaser Certification
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	Exhibit E
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	Form of Non-Recourse Release
</TD>

<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	Exhibit F

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	Form of Control Agreement
