</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	iv
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage231"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amended and Restated Indenture, dated as of February&nbsp;4, 2015 (as amended or
	supplemented from time to time as permitted hereby, the &#147;
<U>
	Indenture
</U>
	&#148;), between TEXTAINER MARINE CONTAINERS IV LIMITED, an exempted company with limited liability incorporated and existing under the laws of Bermuda (the
	&#147;
<U>
	Issuer
</U>
	&#148;), and WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association, as Indenture Trustee (the &#147;
<U>
	Indenture Trustee
</U>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	W
</U>
<U>
	I
</U>
<U>
	T
</U>
<U>
	N
</U>
<U>
	E
</U>
<U>
	S
</U>
<U>
	S
</U>
<U>
	E
</U>
<U>
	T
</U>
<U>
	H
</U>
	:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the Issuer and Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as indenture trustee, entered into an Indenture, dated as of August&nbsp;5,
	2013 (as amended as of October&nbsp;29, 2013, the &#147;
<U>
	Prior Agreement
</U>
	&#148;);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, the Issuer and the Indenture Trustee wish
	to amend the Prior Agreement as of February&nbsp;4, 2015 (the &#147;
<U>
	Restatement Date
</U>
	&#148;), and, for ease of reference, to restate the terms of the Indenture in their entirety;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual agreements herein contained, each party agrees as follows for the benefit of the Noteholders and
	each Interest Rate Hedge Provider:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	GRANTING CLAUSE
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To secure the payment of the Aggregate Outstanding Obligations and the performance of all of the Issuer&#146;s covenants and agreements in
	this Indenture and each other Related Document to which it is a party, the Issuer hereby grants, assigns, conveys, mortgages, pledges, charges, hypothecates and transfers to the Indenture Trustee, for the benefit of the Noteholders of all Series of
	Notes and each Interest Rate Hedge Provider, a first priority perfected security interest in and to all assets and property of the Issuer (other than the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Series-Specific
</FONT>
	Collateral), whether now existing or
	hereafter acquired, including without limitation all of the Issuer&#146;s right, title and interest in, to and under the following (other than the Series-Specific Collateral), whether now existing or hereafter created or acquired (with respect to
	clauses (v)&nbsp;through (xv)&nbsp;below, only to the extent such assets or property arise out of or in any way relate to (but only to the extent they relate to) the Managed Containers):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) the Managed Containers and all other Transferred Assets;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) all Deposit Accounts and all Securities Accounts, including the Trust Account, the Excess Funding Account, any Pre-Funding
	Account and any Series Account, and all cash and cash equivalents, Eligible Investments, Financial Assets, Investment Property, Securities Entitlements and other instruments or amounts credited or deposited from time to time in any of the foregoing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) the Contribution and Sale Agreement, each Container Transfer Agreement, the Management Agreement, Interest Rate
	Hedge Agreement and each other Related Document to which the Issuer is a party;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage232"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) all collections received by the Issuer from the operation of the Managed
	Containers, including any Issuer Proceeds and Pre-Adjustment Issuer Proceeds, on deposit in the Master Account;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) all
	Accounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi) all Chattel Paper, and all Leases and all schedules, supplements, amendments, modifications, renewals,
	extensions and all guaranties and other credit support with respect to the foregoing and all rentals, payments and monies due and to become due in respect of the foregoing, and all rights to terminate or compel performance thereof;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii) all Contracts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(viii) all Documents;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ix) all General Intangibles;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(x) all Instruments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xi) all Inventory;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xii) all Supporting Obligations;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xiii) all Equipment;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xiv) all Letter of Credit Rights;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xv) all Commercial Tort Claims;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xvi) all property of the Issuer held by the Indenture Trustee including, without limitation, all property of every description
	now or hereafter in the possession or custody of or in transit to the Indenture Trustee for any purpose, including, without limitation, safekeeping, collection or pledge, for the account of the Issuer, or as to which the Issuer may have any right or
	power;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xvii) the right of the Issuer to terminate, perform under, or compel performance of the terms of the Container
	Related Agreements and all claims for damages arising out of the breach of any Container Related Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xviii) any
	guarantee of the Container Related Agreements and any rights of the Issuer in respect of any subleases or assignments permitted under the Container Related Agreements;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xix) all or any part of insurance proceeds of all or any part of the Collateral and all proceeds of the voluntary or
	involuntary disposition of all or any part of the Collateral or such proceeds;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-2-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage233"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xx) any and all payments made or due to the Issuer in connection with any
	requisition, confiscation, condemnation, seizure or forfeiture of all or any part of the Collateral by any Governmental Authority and any other cash or non-cash receipts from the sale, exchange, collection or other disposition of all or any part of
	the Collateral;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xxi) to the extent not otherwise included, all income, payments and Proceeds of each of the foregoing and
	all accessions to, substitutions and replacements for, and rents, profits and products of each of the foregoing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that, notwithstanding the foregoing, the &#147;Collateral&#148; shall specifically exclude (A)&nbsp;any Series-Specific Collateral and (B)&nbsp;any Managed Container that (1)&nbsp;is on lease to a Prohibited Person or (2)&nbsp;to the
	actual knowledge of the Issuer or the Manager, is subleased to a Prohibited Person or located or used in a Prohibited Jurisdiction in a manner which would violate the laws of the United States (other than pursuant to a license issued by OFAC).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All of the property described in this Granting Clause is herein collectively called the &#147;
<U>
	Collateral
</U>
	&#148; and as such is security
	for the payment of the Aggregate Outstanding Obligations and the performance of all of the Issuer&#146;s covenants and agreements in this Indenture and each other Related Document to which it is a party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In furtherance of the foregoing, the Issuer hereby grants, assigns, conveys, mortgages, pledges, charges, hypothecates and transfers to the
	Indenture Trustee, for the benefit of the Noteholders and each Interest Rate Hedge Provider, (i)&nbsp;a fixed charge over the Contribution and Sale Agreement, each Container Transfer Agreement and the Management Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;a floating
	charge over all other assets of the Issuer (other than the Series-Specific Collateral).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In furtherance of the foregoing, the Issuer
	hereby appoints the Indenture Trustee as its designee for purposes of exercising the power of attorney granted by the Manager pursuant to Section&nbsp;11.4 of the Management Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Indenture Trustee acknowledges such Grant, accepts the trusts hereunder in accordance with the provisions hereof, and agrees to perform
	the duties herein required as hereinafter provided. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Indenture Trustee does not assume, and shall have no liability to perform, any of the Issuer&#146;s obligations under any agreement included in the Collateral and
	shall have no liability arising from the failure of the Issuer or any other Person to duly perform any such obligations. The Issuer hereby confirms and the Indenture Trustee hereby acknowledges that the Issuer does not currently have any rights with
	respect to Commercial Tort Claims on the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Issuer hereby irrevocably authorizes the Indenture Trustee at any time, and
	from time to time, to file in any filing office in any UCC jurisdiction any financing statements (including any such financing statements claiming a security interest in all assets of the Issuer, other than the Series-Specific Collateral) and
	amendments thereto that (i)&nbsp;indicate the Collateral, regardless of whether any particular asset comprised in the Collateral falls within the scope of Article 9 of the UCC, and (ii)&nbsp;provide any other information required by Article 9 of the
	UCC for
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-3-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage234"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the sufficiency or filing office acceptance of any financing statement or amendment, including whether the Issuer is an organization, the type of organization and any organizational
	identification number issued to the Issuer. The Issuer agrees to furnish any such information to the Indenture Trustee promptly upon the Indenture Trustee&#146;s request. The Issuer also ratifies its authorization for the Indenture Trustee to have
	filed in any jurisdiction any similar initial financing statements or amendments thereto if filed prior to the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE I
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	DEFINITIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;101.
<U>
	Defined Terms
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Capitalized terms used in this Indenture shall have the following meanings and the definitions of such terms shall
	be equally applicable to both the singular and plural forms of such terms:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Account
</I>
	: Any &#147;account&#148;, as such term is
	defined in Section&nbsp;9-102(a)(2) of the UCC.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Accrual Condition
</I>
	: As of any Transfer Date, the condition that shall exist if the
	Managed Containers transferred on such Transfer Date shall be transferred to the Issuer without the transfer of accrued rentals that are owed by the related Lessee for periods prior to the Transfer Date.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Additional Funding Amount
</I>
	: For each Transfer Date, an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the actual number of days in the two
	(2)&nbsp;calendar months immediately following such Transfer Date and (ii)&nbsp;the then average daily gross billed (per diem) rate on all Leases in effect on such Transfer Date with respect to all Eligible Containers transferred on such Transfer
	Date.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Administrative Agent
</I>
	: If applicable, this term shall have the meaning set forth in the related Supplement for the
	respective Series.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Advance Rate
</I>
	: With respect to any Series of Notes then Outstanding (or any Class thereof), the
	percentage specified as such in the related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Affiliate
</I>
	: With respect to a specified Person, any other Person
	that directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries controls or is controlled by or is under common control with the specified Person. For the purposes of this definition, &#147;control&#148;, when used with respect to any specified
	Person, means the power to direct the management and policies of such Person, directly or indirectly, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or otherwise; and the terms &#147;controlling&#148; and &#147;controlled&#148; have
	meanings correlative to the foregoing.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Aggregate Asset Base
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, the sum of the Asset Bases
	for all Series of Notes then Outstanding.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-4-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage235"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Aggregate Net Book Value
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, an amount equal to the sum of
	the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers of all Series.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Aggregate Outstanding Obligations
</I>
	: As of any date of
	determination, an amount equal to the sum of (i)&nbsp;the Outstanding Obligations for all Series of Notes then Outstanding, and (ii)&nbsp;all other amounts owing by the Issuer to the Indenture Trustee, each Administrative Agent, any Noteholder or
	any Interest Rate Hedge Provider pursuant to the terms of any Related Document.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Aggregate Principal Balance
</I>
	: As of any date
	of determination, an amount equal to the sum of the then Unpaid Principal Balance of all Series of Notes then Outstanding.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Applicable Law
</I>
	: With respect to any Person or Managed Container, all law, treaties, judgment, decrees, injunctions, waits, rules,
	regulations, orders, directives, concessions, licenses and permits of any Governmental Authority applicable to such Person or its Property or in respect of its operations.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Asset Allocation Percentage
</I>
	. As of any date of determination for each Series of Notes then Outstanding, a fraction (expressed as a
	percentage) equal to (A)&nbsp;divided by (B), as follows:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A) (x) the Asset Entitlement for such Series of Notes as
	of such date of determination, divided by (y)&nbsp;an amount equal to (1)&nbsp;one hundred percent (100%)&nbsp;minus (2)&nbsp;the Required Overcollateralization Percentage for such Series; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B) the aggregate of clause (A)&nbsp;as determined for all Series then Outstanding as of such date of determination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision herein or in the Related Documents, if on any date of determination only one Series of Notes is then
	Outstanding, the Asset Allocation Percentage for such Series of Notes on such date of determination shall be equal to one hundred percent (100%).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Asset Base
</I>
	: As of any date of determination for each Series of Notes, the amount identified as such in the related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Asset Base Deficiency
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, the condition that exists if the Aggregate Principal Balance exceeds
	the Aggregate Asset Base on such date. If such term is used in a quantitative context, the amount of the Asset Base Deficiency shall be equal to the amount of such excess.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Asset Base Report
</I>
	: A certificate with appropriate insertions setting forth the components of the Asset Base as of the date of
	determination for which such certificate is submitted, which certificate shall be substantially in the form of
<U>
	Exhibit A
</U>
	to this Indenture (and, for purposes of any Series, including any additional Asset Base Report that may be required
	pursuant to the terms of the Supplement under which such Series was issued) and shall be certified by an Authorized Signatory of the Manager or one of its permitted Affiliates on behalf of the Manager.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-5-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage236"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Asset Entitlement
</I>
	. As of any date of determination for each Series of Notes then
	Outstanding, an amount equal to the Unpaid Principal Balance of such Series of Notes as of such date of determination.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Authorized Signatory
</I>
	: Any Person designated by written notice delivered to the Indenture Trustee as authorized to execute documents and
	instruments on behalf of a Person.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Available Distribution Amount
</I>
	: For any Payment Date, all amounts in the Trust Account on
	the related Determination Date that consist of: (i)&nbsp;Issuer Proceeds, less certain sums deducted in accordance with the terms of the Management Agreement, in each case for the most recently completed Collection Period, (ii)&nbsp;all Warranty
	Purchase Amounts and Manager Advances received by the Issuer after the Determination Date in the immediately preceding month, (iii)&nbsp;any earnings on Eligible Investments in the Trust Account to the extent that such earnings were credited to such
	account after the Determination Date in the immediately preceding month, (iv)&nbsp;if such Payment Date occurs in one of the two (2)&nbsp;calendar months immediately succeeding any Transfer Date, an amount equal to the product of (x)&nbsp;fifty
	percent (50%)&nbsp;and (y)&nbsp;the Additional Funding Amount for such Transfer Date, (v)&nbsp;funds transferred from the Excess Funding Account on such Payment Date and (vi)&nbsp;any capital contribution (to the extent consisting of cash) made to
	the Issuer after the Determination Date in the immediately preceding month. In no event shall the Available Distribution Amount include the proceeds of the Containers and Leases sold at the direction of a Liquidating Series pursuant to
	Section&nbsp;804(b) of this Indenture.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Bankruptcy Code
</I>
	: The United States Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1978, as amended.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Book-Entry Custodian
</I>
	: The Person appointed pursuant to the terms of this Indenture to act in accordance with a certain letter
	of representations agreement such Person has with the Depositary, in which the Depositary delegates its duties to maintain the Book-Entry Notes to such Person and authorizes such Person to perform such duties.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Book-Entry Notes
</I>
	: Collectively, the Rule 144A Book-Entry Notes, the Regulation S Temporary Book-Entry Notes and the Unrestricted
	Book-Entry Notes.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Business Day
</I>
	: Any day other than a Saturday, a Sunday or a day on which the New York Stock Exchange, the
	Federal Reserve Bank or banking institutions in San Francisco, California, New York, New York, London, United Kingdom, Amsterdam, The Netherlands or the city in which the Corporate Trust Office is located, are authorized or are obligated by law,
	executive order or governmental decree to be closed.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Capital Contribution
</I>
	: With respect to any Person, any cash and/or the
	fair market value of any property contributed to the capital of such Person by the owners of the equity interests thereof.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-6-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage237"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Casualty Loss
</I>
	: Any of the following events with respect to any Managed Container:
	(a)&nbsp;the actual total loss or compromised total loss of such Managed Container, (b)&nbsp;the loss, theft or destruction of such Managed Container, (c)&nbsp;thirty (30)&nbsp;days following a determination by, or on behalf of, the Issuer that such
	Managed Container is damaged beyond repair or permanently rendered unfit for use for any reason whatsoever, (d)&nbsp;the seizure, condemnation or confiscation of such Managed Container for a period exceeding sixty (60)&nbsp;days or (e)&nbsp;if such
	Managed Container is subject to a Lease, such Managed Container shall have been deemed under its Lease to have suffered a casualty loss as to the entire Managed Container. In determining the date on which a Casualty Loss occurred, the application of
	the time frames set forth in clauses (a)&nbsp;through (e)&nbsp;above shall in no event result in the deemed occurrence of a Casualty Loss prior to the date on which an officer of the Issuer or the Manager obtains actual knowledge of such Casualty
	Loss.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Chattel Paper
</I>
	: Any lease (including any Finance Lease) or other &#147;chattel paper&#148;, as such term is defined in
	Section&nbsp;9-102(a)(11) of the UCC.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Class
</I>
	: With respect to any Series, all Notes within such Series having the same
	rights to payment under the related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Code
</I>
	: The Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or any successor
	statute thereto.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Collateral
</I>
	: This term shall have the meaning set forth in the Granting Clause of this Indenture.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Collection Allocation Percentage
</I>
	. As of any date of determination for each Series of Notes, a fraction (expressed as a
	percentage) equal to (A)&nbsp;divided by (B), as follows:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A) the Invested Amount for such Series of Notes; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B) the sum of the Invested Amount for all Series of Notes Outstanding (exclusive of the Invested Amount for any
	Liquidation Deficiency Series).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Collection Period
</I>
	: The period from the first day of the calendar month immediately preceding the
	month in which such Payment Date occurs through and including the last day of such calendar month.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Collections
</I>
	: With
	respect to any Collection Period, all payments (including any cash proceeds) actually received by the Issuer, or by the Manager on behalf of the Issuer, with respect to the Managed Containers and the other items of Collateral.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</I>
	: Any &#147;commercial tort claim&#148;, as such term is defined in 9-102(a)(13) of the UCC.

</I>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Competitor
</I>
	: Any Person engaged and competing with any of the Issuer, TL, TGH or the Manager in the Container leasing business;
<I>
	provided, however
</I>
	, that in no event shall any insurance company, bank, bank holding company, savings institution or trust company, fraternal benefit society, pension, retirement or profit sharing trust or fund, or any collateralized bond
	obligation fund or similar fund (or any trustee of any such fund) or any holder of any obligations of any such fund (solely as a result of being such a holder) be deemed to be a Competitor.
<I>
</I>
</P>

	container.

	Agreement and the Chattel Paper.

</I>
	: All contracts, undertakings, franchise
	agreements or other agreements (other than rights evidenced by Chattel Paper, Documents or Instruments), arising out of or in any way related to the Managed Containers or to the Notes, in or under which Issuer may now or hereafter have any right,
	title or interest, including, without limitation, the Management Agreement, the Contribution and Sale Agreement, any Container Transfer Agreement, any Interest Rate Hedge Agreements and any related agreements, security interests or UCC or other
	financing statements and, with respect to an Account, any agreement relating to the terms of payment or the terms of performance thereof.

	:

	with respect to such Series of Warehouse Notes.

</I>
	: The principal office of the Indenture Trustee at which at any particular time its corporate trust business
	shall be administered. As of the date hereof, such office is located at Sixth Street and Marquette Avenue in Minneapolis, Minnesota 55479.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</I>
	: Any Treasurer, Assistant Treasurer, Assistant Trust Officer, Trust Officer, Assistant Vice President, Vice
	President or Senior Vice President of the Indenture Trustee or any other officer who customarily performs functions similar to those performed by the Persons who at the time shall be such officers to whom any corporate trust matter is referred
	because of their knowledge of and familiarity with the particular subject.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Default Interest
</I>
	: The incremental interest
	specified in the related Supplement payable by the Issuer resulting from (i)&nbsp;the failure of the Issuer to pay when due any principal of or interest on the Notes of the related Series or (ii)&nbsp;the occurrence of an Event of Default with
	respect to such Series.
<I>
</I>
</P>

	Default Rate
</I>
	: For each Series of Notes, the incremental interest rate set forth in the related
	Supplement at which Default Interest for such Series is calculated.
<I>
</I>

</I>
	: A Note issued in physical form
	pursuant to the terms and conditions of Section&nbsp;202 hereof.

<I>
	Depositary
</I>
	: The Depository
	Trust Company until a successor depositary shall have become such pursuant to the applicable provisions of this Indenture and thereafter &#147;Depositary&#148; shall mean or include each Person who is then a Depositary hereunder. For purposes of
	this Indenture, unless otherwise specified pursuant to Section&nbsp;202, any successor Depositary shall, at the time of its designation and at all times while it serves as Depositary, be a clearing agency registered under the Exchange Act, and any
	other applicable statute or regulation.
<I>
</I>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Depreciation Policy
</I>
	: One of the following:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) for purposes of calculating the Asset Base, either:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A) the policy in effect on the Restatement Date under which the Original Equipment Cost of a Managed Container is depreciated
	(x)&nbsp;in the case of a Managed Container originally acquired by TL directly from the manufacturer of such Managed Container, using the straight-line method over a thirteen (13)&nbsp;year
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-9-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage240"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	useful life (except in the case of 2R, 2Y and 4Y (refrigerated) containers, in which case a twelve (12)&nbsp;year useful life will be used or in the case of 2T, 2L, 4T and 4L containers, in which
	case a fourteen (14)&nbsp;year useful life will be used), in each case, to the Residual Value, or (y)&nbsp;in the case of a Managed Container not included in clause (x), using the straight-line method over the remaining useful life of such Managed
	Container as of the date of acquisition of such Managed Container by TL (based upon a total useful life of thirteen (13)&nbsp;years (except in the case of 2R, 2Y and 4Y (refrigerated) containers, in which case a twelve (12)&nbsp;year useful life
	will be used or, in the case of 2T, 2L, 4T and 4L containers, in which case a fourteen (14)&nbsp;year useful life will be used, to the Residual Value)); or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B) such other depreciation policy adopted after the Restatement Date that complies with GAAP and for which the requirements of
	Section&nbsp;606(h) have been satisfied (provided that, for the avoidance of doubt, under no circumstances shall a change in the depreciation policy under this clause (B)&nbsp;result in an increase to the Net Book Value of a Managed Container); and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) for any purpose other than calculating the Asset Base, such depreciation policy as is determined by the Issuer in
	accordance with GAAP.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Determination Date
</I>
	: The fourth (4
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;Business Day
	prior to the related Payment Date.
<I>
</I>
</P>

</I>
	: AMACAR Investments LLC, a Delaware limited liability
	company, and its successors and assigns.
<I>
</I>

</I>
	: Dollars and the sign &#147;$&#148; means lawful money of the United States
	of America.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	: With respect to any Series, any Trust Early Amortization Event and any

</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	EBIT
</I>
	: For any Person on a consolidated basis during any fiscal
	period, earnings (loss) before Interest Expense and taxes for such Person and its Subsidiaries, including gains and losses from the sale of assets and foreign exchange transactions, but excluding (A)&nbsp;gains or losses resulting from changes in
	the applicable depreciation policy and (B)&nbsp;unrealized gain and loss arising from the implementation of FAS 133.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Eligible
	Account
</I>
	: Any of (a)&nbsp;a segregated account with an Eligible Institution, (b)&nbsp;a segregated trust account with the corporate trust department of a depository institution organized under the laws of the United States or any of the states
	thereof, including the District of Columbia (or any domestic branch of a foreign bank), and acting as a trustee for funds deposited in such account, so long as the senior securities of such depository institution shall
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-10-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage241"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	have a credit rating from each of Moody&#146;s and Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s in one of its generic credit rating categories no lower than &#147;A3&#148; or &#147;A-&#148;, as the case may
	be, or (c)&nbsp;an account held with the Indenture Trustee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Eligible Container
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, any Managed
	Container which, when considered with all other Managed Containers, shall comply with the following requirements:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)
<U>
	Specifications
</U>
	. Such Managed Container conforms to the standard specifications used by the Manager for Containers
	purchased by and on behalf of Container owners other than the Issuer for that category of Container and to any applicable standards promulgated by applicable international standards organizations;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)
<U>
	Casualty Losses
</U>
	. Such Managed Container shall not have suffered a Casualty Loss;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii)
<U>
	Minimum Age
</U>
	. Such Managed Container shall be at least five (5)&nbsp;years old;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv)
<U>
	Maximum Age
</U>
	. At the time of conveyance to the Issuer (except the date of the first conveyance by TMCLII pursuant to
	the TMCLII Container Transfer Agreement), such Managed Container does not have an age (measured from its manufacture date) greater than fifteen (15)&nbsp;years if it is a dry container and/or special container (other than a refrigerated container),
	and does not have an age (measured from its manufacture date) greater than thirteen (13)&nbsp;years if it is a refrigerated container; provided, however, that in no event shall any Managed Container with a container age (measured from its
	manufacture date) greater than twenty-five (25)&nbsp;years be an Eligible Container;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v)
<U>
	Weighted Average Age
</U>
	. The
	inclusion of such Managed Container on the applicable Transfer Date among the Eligible Containers does not cause the Weighted Average Age of all Eligible Containers to exceed thirteen (13)&nbsp;years (or, if the Weighted Average Age of all Eligible
	Containers exceeds thirteen (13)&nbsp;years prior to such Transfer Date, such transferred Managed Container will cause the Weighted Average Age of all Eligible Containers (calculated after giving effect to such transfer) to be less than thirteen
	(13)&nbsp;years) (for the avoidance of doubt, (x)&nbsp;the foregoing shall be measured only on each such Transfer Date and (y)&nbsp;if the inclusion of any such Managed Containers on a Transfer Date shall cause the Weighted Average Age of all
	Eligible Containers to exceed thirteen (13)&nbsp;years (or, if the Weighted Average Age of all Eligible Containers exceeds thirteen (13)&nbsp;years prior to such Transfer Date and is not reduced to thirteen (13)&nbsp;years or less as a result of
	such transfer, then only the Managed Containers being transferred to the Issuer on such Transfer Date (to the extent causing such condition to occur) shall fail to qualify as Eligible Containers);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi)
<U>
	Title
</U>
	. The related Seller shall have had good and marketable title at the time of conveyance to the Issuer;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-11-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage242"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii)
<U>
	No Violation
</U>
	. The conveyance of such Managed Container to the Issuer
	does not violate any agreement of the related Seller;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(viii)
<U>
	Assignability
</U>
	. Except with respect to Leases with the
	U.S. government, the Lease rights with respect to such Managed Container are freely assignable;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ix)
<U>
	All Necessary
	Actions Taken
</U>
	. The related Seller and the Issuer shall have taken all necessary actions to transfer title to such Managed Container and all related Leases (other than TUS Subleases) from such Seller to the Issuer;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(x)
<U>
	General Trading Terms
</U>
	. Substantially all of the Leases for Eligible Containers shall contain the general trading
	terms the Manager uses in its normal course of business;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xi)
<U>
	Purchase Price
</U>
	. In the case of a Managed Container
	purchased by the Issuer, the purchase price paid by the related Seller for such Managed Container was not greater than the fair market value of such Managed Container at the time of acquisition by such Seller;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xii)
<U>
	No Adverse Selection Procedures
</U>
	. The selection procedures used in selecting such Managed Container to be
	transferred to the Issuer did not discriminate against the Issuer in aggregate as to the type of Containers, utilization potential, lease rates, lessees or Lease terms, in comparison on an approximate basis, to the subset of the fleet of Containers
	owned in the aggregate by all Subsidiaries of TGH (other than TW Container Leasing Ltd.) that are within the minimum allowable age (as set forth in clause (iii)&nbsp;above) and the maximum allowable age (as set forth in clause (iv)&nbsp;above);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xiii)
<U>
	No Prohibited Person or Prohibited Jurisdiction
</U>
	. Such Managed Container is then not on lease to a Prohibited
	Person, and to the actual knowledge of the Issuer or the Manager, is not subleased to a Prohibited Person or located, operated or used in a Prohibited Jurisdiction unless it is used by the government of the United States or one of its allies or
	pursuant to a license granted by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the United States Treasury Department;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xiv)
<U>
	Good Title; No Liens
</U>
	. The Issuer has good and marketable title to such Managed Container, free and clear of all Liens other than Permitted Encumbrances;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xv)
<U>
	Container Representations and Warranties
</U>
	. The Container Representations and Warranties applicable to such Managed
	Container are true and correct;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xvi)
<U>
	Restrictions on Acquisitions from Affiliates
</U>
	. Such Managed Container is not
	subject to a Lease in which the Manager, the Issuer or any of their respective Affiliates is the lessee;
<I>
	provided, however,
</I>
	that a Managed Container is permitted to be subject to a Head Lease Agreement and a TUS Sublease;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-12-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage243"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xvii)
<U>
	Bankrupt Lessees under Finance Leases
</U>
	. Such Managed Container is
	not then under a Finance Lease to a lessee which, to the best knowledge of the Manager, is the subject of an Insolvency Proceeding; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xviii)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Off-Hire Containers in any Group of Managed Containers Transferred to the Issuer after the
	date hereof
</U>
	. The sum of the Net Book Values of all Managed Containers (other than those transferred to the Issuer by TMCLII on the first date of such a transfer pursuant to the TMCLII Container Transfer Agreement), which are then off-hire and
	which are transferred to the Issuer on any Transfer Date, shall not exceed an amount equal to eleven percent (11%)&nbsp;of the sum of the Net Book Values of all of the Managed Containers which are transferred to the Issuer on such Transfer Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Eligible Institution
</I>
	: Any one or more of the following institutions: (i)&nbsp;the corporate trust department of the Indenture
	Trustee;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that the Indenture Trustee maintains a long-term unsecured senior debt rating of at least &#147;A&#148; or better from Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s or &#147;A2 or better from Moody&#146;s (so long an Notes deemed
	Outstanding hereunder are rated by Moody&#146;s), or (ii)&nbsp;a depositary institution organized under the laws of the United States of America or any one of the states thereof or the District of Columbia (or any domestic branch of a foreign bank),
	(a)&nbsp;which has both (x)&nbsp;a long-term unsecured senior debt rating of not less than &#147;A&#148; by Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s Ratings Group and &#147;A2&#148; by Moody&#146;s Investors Service, Inc., and (y)&nbsp;a short-term unsecured
	senior debt rating rated in the highest rating category by each Rating Agency and (b)&nbsp;whose deposits are insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Eligible Investments
</I>
	: One or more of the following:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) direct obligations of, and obligations fully guaranteed as to the timely payment of principal and interest by, the United
	States or obligations of any agency or instrumentality thereof when such obligations are backed by the full faith and credit of the United States;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) certificates of deposit and bankers&#146; acceptances (which shall each have an original maturity of not more than three
	hundred sixty-five (365)&nbsp;days) of any United States depository institution or trust company incorporated under the laws of the United States or any State and subject to supervision and examination by federal and/or State authorities,
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that the long-term unsecured senior debt obligations of such depository institution or trust company at the date of acquisition thereof have been rated &#147;AA-/Aa3&#148; or the equivalent or better by the Rating Agencies, or the
	short-term unsecured senior debt obligations of such depository institution or trust company are rated by each Rating Agency in its highest rating category;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) commercial paper (having original maturities of not more than two hundred seventy (270)&nbsp;days) of any corporation
	incorporated under the laws of the United States or any State thereof which on the date of acquisition has been rated by each Rating Agency in the highest short-term unsecured commercial paper rating category;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-13-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage244"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) any money market fund that has been rated by each Rating Agency in its
	highest rating category (including any designations of &#147;plus&#148; or &#147;minus&#148;) or that invests solely in Eligible Investments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) eurodollar deposits (which shall each have an original maturity of not more than three hundred sixty-five (365)&nbsp;days)
	of any depository institution or trust company,
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that the long-term unsecured senior debt obligations of such depository institution or trust company at the date of acquisition thereof have been rated &#147;AA-/Aa3&#148; or the
	equivalent or better by the Rating Agencies, or the short-term unsecured senior debt obligations of such depository institution or trust company are rated by each Rating Agency in its highest rating category; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi) other obligations or securities that are acceptable to each Rating Agency as an Eligible Investment hereunder and will not
	result in a reduction or withdrawal in the then current rating of the Notes as evidenced by a letter to such effect from each Rating Agency.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Nothing in
	the definition of &#147;Eligible Investments&#148; is intended to prohibit the Issuer from acquiring (to the extent permitted above) an Eligible Investment issued by the Indenture Trustee or an Affiliate of the Indenture Trustee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Entitlement Order
</I>
	: Any &#147;entitlement order&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;8-102(8) of the UCC.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Equipment
</I>
	: Any &#147;equipment&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;9-102(a)(33) of the UCC.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	ERISA
</I>
	: The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	ERISA Affiliate
</I>
	: With respect to any Person, any other Person meeting the requirements of paragraphs (b), (c), (m)&nbsp;or (o)&nbsp;of
	Section&nbsp;414 of the Code.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Event of Default
</I>
	: With respect to any Series, any Trust Event of Default and any
	Series-Specific Event of Default for such Series.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Exchange Act
</I>
	: The Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Excess Concentration Percentage
</I>
	: As of any date of determination for each Series of Notes then Outstanding, the percentage
	specified as such in the Related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Excess Funding Account
</I>
	: The account or accounts established pursuant to
	Section&nbsp;306 of this Indenture.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Existing Commitment
</I>
	: With respect to any Series (A)&nbsp;of Warehouse Notes
	(i)&nbsp;prior to its Conversion Date, the aggregate Initial Commitment with respect to such Series of Notes Outstanding, consisting of one or more classes, expressed as a dollar amount, as set forth in the related Supplement and subject to
	reduction from time to time in accordance with the related Supplement and (ii)&nbsp;after its Conversion Date, the then Unpaid Principal Balance of the Notes of such Series and (B)&nbsp;of Term Notes, the then Unpaid Principal Balance of the Notes
	of such Series.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-14-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage245"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Expected Final Payment Date
</I>
	: With respect to any Series, the date on which the principal
	balance of the Outstanding Notes of such Series are expected to be paid in full. The Expected Final Payment Date for a Series shall be set forth in the related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Fair Market Value
</I>
	: With respect to any asset (including a Container), shall mean the price at which a willing buyer, not an Affiliate
	of the seller, and a willing seller who does not have to sell, would agree to purchase and sell such asset, as determined by the Manager.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	FATCA
</I>
	: Sections 1471 through 1474 of the Code and the Treasury Regulations, administrative guidance and official interpretations
	promulgated thereunder.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Finance Lease
</I>
	: Any initial Lease of a Container which provides the Lessee the right or option to
	purchase the Container at the expiration of the Lease and which satisfies the criteria for classification as a capital lease pursuant to GAAP, including Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No.&nbsp;13, as amended.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Financial Asset
</I>
	: Any &#147;financial asset&#148; as such term is defined in
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Section&nbsp;8-102(a)(9)
</FONT>
	of the UCC.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Fleet
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, both
	of the following collectively: (i)&nbsp;the Managed Containers and (ii)&nbsp;without duplication of clause (i), all other Containers then managed by Manager.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	General Intangibles
</I>
	: Any &#147;general intangible&#148; as such term is defined in Section&nbsp;9-102(a)(42) of the UCC.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Generally Accepted Accounting Principles or GAAP
</I>
	: With respect to any Person, those generally accepted accounting principles and
	practices which are recognized as such by (i)&nbsp;the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants acting through its Accounting Principles Board or by the Financial Accounting Standards Board or through other appropriate boards or committees
	thereof consistently applied as to the party in question or (ii)&nbsp;such other equivalent entity(ies) that has or have authority for promulgating accounting principles and practices applicable to such Person.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Governmental Authority
</I>
	: Any of the following: (i)&nbsp;any national, state or other sovereign government, and any federal, regional,
	state, provincial, local, city government or other political subdivision, (ii)&nbsp;any governmental or quasi-governmental agency, authority, board, bureau, commission, department, instrumentality or public body, (iii)&nbsp;any court or
	administrative tribunal or (iv)&nbsp;with respect to any Person, any arbitration tribunal or other non-governmental authority to whose jurisdiction that Person has consented.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Grant
</I>
	: To grant, bargain, sell, convey, assign, transfer, mortgage, pledge, create and perfect a security interest in and right of
	set-off against, deposit, set over and confirm.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-15-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage246"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Head Lease Agreement
</I>
	: A Lease between the Issuer (or the Manager, on behalf of the
	Issuer), as lessor, and TUS, as lessee, that possesses all of the following attributes:
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the rent payable by TUS under such Lease with respect to Managed Containers equals at least 98.5% of the amount of rent received by TUS from the applicable TUS Sublessee;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the obligations of TUS under such Lease are secured by a first priority security interest granted by TUS in all TUS Subleases, and the proceeds of such TUS Subleases, in each case, to the extent but only to the extent
	related to the Managed Containers subject to the Head Lease Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(C)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	such Lease requires that all rental payments payable under the TUS Subleases shall be remitted directly to a Master Account;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(D)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	such Lease requires that a Managed Container not be subleased by TUS to a Prohibited Person and, to the actual knowledge of TUS, shall not be subleased by a TUS Sublessee to a Prohibited Person or located, operated or
	used in a Prohibited Jurisdiction unless it is used pursuant to a license granted by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the United States Treasury Department;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(E)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the term of such Head Lease Agreement with respect to a Managed Container shall expire upon the expiration or earlier termination of the TUS Sublease of such Managed Container;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(F)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	events of default by TUS under such Lease shall include (but not be limited to) the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	i. any rental or other payments received by TUS with respect to a TUS Sublease (other than (i)&nbsp;amounts permitted to be
	deducted pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.1 of the Management Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;amounts equal to the TUS Sublease Spread) with respect to a TUS Sublease of a Managed Container are not remitted to the Trust Account within seven days after the last
	Business Day of the week during which such payments are received by TUS from the applicable TUS Sublessees, and such condition continues unremedied for three (3)&nbsp;Business Days after such remittance is due;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ii. any representation and warranty made by TUS in such Lease, or in any certificate, report, or financial statement delivered
	by it pursuant thereto, shall prove to have been untrue in any material and adverse respect when made and shall continue unremedied for a period of 30 days after the earlier to occur of (i)&nbsp;an officer of TUS has actual knowledge thereof or
	(ii)&nbsp;TUS receives notice thereof;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-16-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage247"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	iii. TUS shall cease to be engaged in the container management business;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	iv. the filing of any petition in any bankruptcy proceeding, any assignment for the benefit of creditors, appointment of a
	receiver of all or any of TUS&#146;s assets, entry into any type of liquidation, whether compulsory or voluntary, or the initiation of any other bankruptcy or insolvency proceeding by or against TUS including, without limitation, any action by TUS
	to call a meeting of its creditors or to compound with or negotiate for any composition with its creditors; provided that, in the case of any involuntary proceeding, such proceeding is not dismissed or stayed within 60 days;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	v. TUS is unable to pay its debts when due or shall commence an insolvency proceeding;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	vi. TUS assigns its interest in such Lease (provided that no sublease of a Managed Container shall be deemed to constitute an
	assignment of such Lease);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	vii. TUS shall have failed to pay any amounts due or suffered to exist an event of default with
	respect to the term of any indebtedness which singularly or in the aggregate exceeds $1,000,000 and the effect of such failure or event of default is to cause such indebtedness to be immediately declared due and payable prior to the date on which it
	would otherwise have been due and payable;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	viii. either of the following shall occur: (i)&nbsp;TUS shall have Consolidated
	Funded Debt (as defined in the Management Agreement) in excess of $1,000,000 or (ii)&nbsp;the annual after-tax profit of TUS (calculated on a rolling four quarter basis) shall be less than $200,000;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ix. (i) TUS amalgamates or consolidates with, or merges with or into, another Person, (ii)&nbsp;TUS sells, assigns, conveys,
	transfers, leases, or otherwise disposes of (in each case, whether in one transaction or a series of transactions) all, or substantially all, of its assets to any person, other than pursuant to subleases of Containers, (iii)&nbsp;any person
	amalgamates or consolidates with, or merges with or into, TUS, or (iv)&nbsp;the Manager shall fail to own, directly or indirectly, a majority of the equity interests in TUS;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	x. a judgment is rendered against TUS that is in excess of $1,000,000 and such judgment is not covered by insurance or bonded
	or stayed within 30&nbsp;days of becoming final; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	xi. the lien, created by TUS on its interest in the TUS Subleases and
	the proceeds thereof (the &#147;
<U>
	Sublease Collateral
</U>
	&#148;) pursuant to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	-17-
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage248"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the terms of the Head Lease Agreement, shall fail to be perfected or the Sublease Collateral shall be subject to a Lien other than a Permitted Encumbrance.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Holder
</I>
	: See
<I>
	Noteholder
</I>
	.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Indebtedness
</I>
	: With respect to any Person means, without duplication, (a)&nbsp;any obligation of such Person for borrowed money,
	including, without limitation, (i)&nbsp;any obligation incurred through the issuance and sale of bonds, debentures, notes or other similar debt instruments, and (ii)&nbsp;any obligation for borrowed money which is non-recourse to the credit of such
	Person but which is secured by any asset of such Person, (b)&nbsp;any obligation of such Person on account of deposits or advances, (c)&nbsp;any obligation of such Person for the deferred purchase price of any property or services, except accounts
	payable arising in the ordinary course of such Person&#146;s business, (d)&nbsp;any obligation of such Person as lessee under a capital lease, (e)&nbsp;any Indebtedness of another secured by a Lien on any asset of such Person, whether or not such
	Indebtedness is assumed by such Person, (f)&nbsp;any obligation in respect of interest rate or foreign exchange hedging agreements, (g)&nbsp;liabilities and obligations of others for which such Person is directly or indirectly liable, by way of
	guaranty (whether by direct guaranty, suretyship, discount, endorsement, take-or-pay agreement, agreement to purchase or advance or keep in funds or other agreement having the effect of a guaranty) and (h)&nbsp;any obligation of such Person to
	reimburse the issuer of any letter of credit issued for the account of such Person upon which a draw has been made.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Indenture
</I>
	: This Amended and Restated Indenture, dated as of February&nbsp;4, 2015, between the Issuer and the Indenture Trustee and all
	amendments hereof and supplements hereto, including, with respect to any Series or Class, the related Supplement.
<I>
</I>
</P>

	Trustee

	: The Person performing the duties of the Indenture Trustee under this Indenture.
<I>

</I>
	: The
	compensation payable to the Indenture Trustee for its services under this Indenture and the other Related Documents to which it is a party. Indenture Trustee Fees do not include Indenture Trustee Indemnified Amounts.
<I>
</I>

	Indenture.

	recognized standing selected by Issuer and acceptable to the Requisite Global Majority.

	: With respect to

	jurisdiction.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Intangible Assets
</I>
	: As of any date of determination, with respect to any Person, the intangible assets of such Person determined in
	accordance with GAAP.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Interest Expense
</I>
	: For any Person on a consolidated basis during any fiscal period, the aggregate
	amount of the interest expense during such fiscal period in respect of Indebtedness of such Person and its Subsidiaries, as determined in accordance with GAAP.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Interest Rate Hedge Agreement
</I>
	: An ISDA interest rate cap agreement, ISDA interest rate swap agreement, ISDA interest rate ceiling
	agreement, ISDA interest rate floor agreement or any combination of the foregoing or other similar agreement entered into pursuant to the terms of this Indenture or any Supplement, including any schedules and confirmations prepared and delivered in
	connection therewith.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Interest Rate Hedge Provider
</I>
	: A counterparty to an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	Inventory
</I>
	: Any &#147;inventory,&#148; as such term is defined in Section&nbsp;9-102(a)(48) of the UCC.
