</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Master Lease Management Fee
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;404(a)(i)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Notes
</B>
	&#148; means any Series 2013-1 Note.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	OEM
</B>
	&#148; means an original equipment manufacturer.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	OEM Container
</B>
	&#148; means any Managed Container that was originally acquired by TL directly from the OEM of such
	Container.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Other Taxes
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;208(b)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Permitted Interest Withdrawal
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;302(b).
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Permitted Principal Withdrawal
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;302(c).
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Prime Rate
</B>
	&#148; means the rate announced by Royal Bank of Canada (or any successor thereto), from time to time as its
	&#147;
<B>
	prime rate
</B>
	&#148; or &#147;
<B>
	base rate
</B>
	&#148; in the United States, such rate to change as and when such designated rate changes. The Prime Rate is not intended to be the lowest rate of interest charged by Royal Bank of Canada (or
	any successor thereto) in connection with extensions of credit to debtors. For sake of clarity, the references to Royal Bank of Canada in the two preceding sentences are not intended to refer to the initial Indenture Trustee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Prior Agreement
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Recitals to this Supplement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Pro Rata Share
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to each Series 2013-1 Noteholder as of any date of determination, a ratio (expressed as
	a percentage) the numerator of which is equal to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	9
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage349"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the Series 2013-1 Note Commitment (or, if the Conversion Date has occurred, the Series 2013-1 Note Principal Balance) of such Series 2013-1 Noteholder and the denominator of which is equal to the
	sum of the Series 2013-1 Note Commitments of all Series 2013-1 Noteholders (or, if the Conversion Date has occurred, the Unpaid Principal Balance for Series 2013-1).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Purchase Leaseback Container
</B>
	&#148; means any Managed Container originally acquired by TL in a Purchase Leaseback Transaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Purchase Leaseback Transaction
</B>
	&#148; means any transaction (or series of related transactions) pursuant to which TL acquired
	one or more Managed Containers from a third party seller that is not an OEM and, contemporaneously with such acquisition, leased such Managed Container to such third party seller or one of its Affiliates.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Purchaser
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Restatement Date
</B>
	&#148; means February&nbsp;4, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Restricted Issuance
</B>
	&#148; means (i)&nbsp;any commercial paper or (ii)&nbsp;any share, participation, or other interest in the
	property of the Issuer or an obligation of the Issuer that, in the case of either clause (i)&nbsp;or clause (ii), (a)&nbsp;is either represented by (1)&nbsp;an instrument issued in bearer or registered form containing a CUSIP number, or (2)&nbsp;if
	it is not represented by an instrument, is registered in books maintained to record transfers by or on behalf of the Issuer, and (b)&nbsp;is cleared through DTC or dealt in on a securities exchange or market, and (c)&nbsp;either (1)&nbsp;is one of a
	class or series or (2)&nbsp;by its terms is divisible into a class or series of shares, participations, interests, or obligations.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Sale Management Fee
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;404(a)(iv)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Sales Proceeds
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Management Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1
</B>
	&#148; means the Series of Notes the terms of which are specified in this Supplement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Advance
</B>
	&#148; means any advance of funds made by, or on behalf of, a Series 2013-1 Noteholder pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;207(b)
</B>
	. For purposes of clarification, only portions of a requested Series 2013-1 Advance actually funded shall be included in calculating the amount of any Series 2013-1 Advance outstanding on any date of determination (and, for
	example, no Affected Portion shall be included during the Affected Funding Period in any calculation of Series 2013-1 Advances until actually funded by the applicable Affected Purchaser).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Advance Rate&#148;
</B>
	means one of the following:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(A) for all OEM Containers, all Third Party Purchased Containers and Purchase Leaseback Containers (which in the case of Purchase
	Leaseback Containers do not in aggregate exceed an amount equal to twenty percent (20%)&nbsp;of the Aggregate Net Book Value), the difference (but not less than zero) of (x)&nbsp;eighty percent (80%)&nbsp;minus (y)&nbsp;the Disposition Adjustment
	(if any) then in effect (such difference, the &#147;
<B>
	Clause A Advance Rate
</B>
	&#148;); and
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	10
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage350"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(B) for each Purchase Leaseback Container not covered in clause (A)&nbsp;but up to a
	maximum amount equal to forty percent (40%)&nbsp;of the Aggregate Net Book Value (for an avoidance of doubt this percentage includes the twenty percent (20%)&nbsp;referenced in clause (A), the difference (but not less than zero) of
	(i)&nbsp;seventy-two and one-half of one percent (72.5%)&nbsp;minus (ii)&nbsp;the Disposition Adjustment (if any) then in effect (such difference, the &#147;
<B>
	Clause B Advance Rate
</B>
	&#148;);
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that for the period commencing on the Restatement Date and ending on the Payment Date occurring on or after the earlier to
	occur of (x)&nbsp;the next Transfer Date following the Restatement Date and (y)&nbsp;April&nbsp;1, 2015, the Clause B Advance Rate shall be deemed to be eighty percent (80%).
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Purchase Leaseback Containers that are not included in either clause (A)&nbsp;or clause (B)&nbsp;shall have a Series 2013-1 Advance Rate equal to zero.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Asset Base&#148;
</B>
	means, as of any date of determination, an amount equal to the sum of (a)&nbsp;the product of
	(i)&nbsp;Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 in effect on such date of determination, (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to one hundred percent (100%)&nbsp;minus the Series 2013-1 Required Overcollateralization Percentage in effect on such date
	of determination and (iii)&nbsp;the sum of (x)&nbsp;the Aggregate Net Book Value (measured as of the last day of the immediately preceding calendar month) and (y)&nbsp;the aggregate outstanding balance of receivables resulting from the sale or
	disposition of Eligible Containers which have not been outstanding for more than 60 days, plus (b)&nbsp;an amount equal to the sum of (i)&nbsp;the amount of cash and Eligible Investments on deposit in the Series 2013-1 Restricted Cash Account on
	such date of determination, and (ii)&nbsp;an amount equal to the product of (x)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 in effect on such date of determination and (y)&nbsp;the amount of cash and Eligible Investments on deposit in the
	Excess Funding Account on such date of determination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Available Funds&#148;
</B>
	means, as of any Payment Date, an
	amount equal to the sum of (i)&nbsp;an amount equal to the product of (x)&nbsp;the Available Distribution Amount for such Payment Date and (y)&nbsp;the Collection Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 in effect on such Payment Date, (ii)&nbsp;all
	amounts transferred to the Series 2013-1 Series Account from the Series 2013-1 Restricted Cash Account on such Payment Date, (iii)&nbsp;all amounts received by the Issuer since the immediately preceding Payment Date pursuant to any Series 2013-1
	Interest Rate Hedge Agreement, (iv)&nbsp;if a Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event shall have occurred and then be continuing, the amount of funds transferred to the Series 2013-1 Series Account from the Excess Funding Account on such Payment
	Date, and (v)&nbsp;the amount of any Shared Available Funds (as defined in the Supplements for each other Series of Notes then Outstanding) deposited to the Series 2013-1 Series Account on such Payment Date in accordance with the terms of the
	Supplement for each other Series of Notes then Outstanding.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event&#148;
</B>
	means, for
	Series 2013-1, the existence of either of the following: (i)&nbsp;a Trust Early Amortization Event set forth in the Indenture shall have occurred and then be continuing in accordance with the terms of the Indenture, or (ii)&nbsp;a Series-Specific
	Early Amortization Event for Series 2013-1 set forth in Section&nbsp;401 hereof shall have occurred and then be continuing.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	11
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage351"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Event of Default&#148;
</B>
	means, for Series 2013-1, the existence of
	either of the following: (i)&nbsp;a Trust Event of Default set forth in the Indenture shall have occurred and then be continuing in accordance with the terms of the Indenture, or (ii)&nbsp;a Series-Specific Event of Default set forth in
	Section&nbsp;403 of this Supplement shall have occurred and then be continuing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	&#147;Series 2013-1 Excess Concentration
	Percentage&#148;
</B>
	means, as of any date of determination, an amount (stated as a percentage) equal to the sum (without duplication) of the following percentages:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Operating Leases to Insolvent Lessees
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all
	Eligible Containers that are currently under an operating lease to an insolvent lessee, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;twenty percent (20%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Operating Leases to Delinquent Insolvent Lessees
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book
	Values of all Eligible Containers that are currently under an operating lease to an insolvent lessee who is more than 150 days delinquent in the payment of any amounts owed to Textainer, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a
	percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;zero percent (0%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Dry Freight Special Containers
</U>
	. The amount by which
	(x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers that are dry freight specialized Containers (other than refrigerated containers), divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;seven percent
	(7%)&nbsp;(for purposes of clarity, the specialized Containers referenced in this clause (c)&nbsp;includes tank Containers);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Refrigerated Containers (Total)
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers that are refrigerated containers, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a
	percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;twenty percent (20%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Finance Leases (Total)
</U>
	. The amount by which
	(x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers that are then subject to a Finance Lease, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;twenty percent (20%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Non-Monthly Rental Payments
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible
	Containers subject to Leases for which rentals are payable less frequently than monthly divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;two percent (2%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Non-U.S. Currency Rentals
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible
	Containers subject to Leases for which rentals are payable in a currency other than Dollars and which are not the subject of a currency hedge agreement divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;two percent
	(2%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	12
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage352"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of Non-Marine Cargo Users
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum
	of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers subject to Leases under which the lessee is a Person that is not a marine cargo user divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;seven percent (7%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of any Ten Lessees
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers
	then on lease to any ten lessees or sublessees, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds (y)&nbsp;seventy-five percent (75%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(j)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of a Single Lessee
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers
	then on lease to any single lessee divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds twenty percent (20%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(k)
<U>
	Maximum Concentration of a Single Lessee with respect to Finance Leases
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers that are then subject to a Finance Lease with any single lessee divided by the
	Aggregate Net Book Value, expressed as a percentage, exceeds five percent (5%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(l)
<U>
	U.S. Government Leases
</U>
	. The amount by which
	(x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers on Lease to the U.S. government, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, exceeds (y)&nbsp;four percent (4%);
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that Leases for which (i)&nbsp;compliance with the
	Federal Assignment of Claims Act have been evidenced by a favorable Opinion of Counsel or (ii)&nbsp;the U.S. government has executed a consent to assignment shall not be included in the foregoing clause (x);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(m)
<U>
	Aged Refrigerated Container
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers that are
	(i)&nbsp;refrigerated Containers and (ii)&nbsp;twelve (12)&nbsp;years and older (measured from the manufacture date of such Container), divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, exceeds (y)&nbsp;five percent (5%);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(n)
<U>
	Twenty Year Aged Containers
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Eligible Containers (other than
	refrigerated Containers) that are twenty (20)&nbsp;years or older (measured from the manufacture date of such Container), divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, exceeds five percent (5%); and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(o)
<U>
	Non-OEM Containers
</U>
	. The amount by which (x)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Third Party Purchased Containers and
	Purchase Leaseback Containers, divided by the Aggregate Net Book Value, exceeds (y)&nbsp;seventy percent (70%).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1
	Interest Rate Hedge Agreement
</B>
	&#148; means any Interest Rate Hedge Agreement entered into in accordance with
<B>
	Section 406
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	13
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage353"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Legal Final Payment Date
</B>
	&#148; means that date that is two years after
	the Stated Conversion Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Management Fee
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;404(a)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Manager Default
</B>
	&#148; means, for Series 2013-1, the existence of either of the following: (i)&nbsp;a Trust Manager
	Default shall have occurred and then be continuing in accordance with the terms of the Management Agreement, or (ii)&nbsp;a Series-Specific Manager Default set forth in Section&nbsp;402 of this Supplement shall have occurred and then be continuing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Note
</B>
	&#148; means any one of the notes issued pursuant to the terms hereof, substantially in the form of
<B>
	Exhibit A
</B>
	, and shall include any and all replacements or substitutions of such notes.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Note
	Commitment
</B>
	&#148; means, for each Series 2013-1 Noteholder (excluding, however, any Series 2013-1 Noteholder which is a CP Purchaser), the commitment of such Series 2013-1 Noteholder to fund Series 2013-1 Advances in an aggregate amount
	outstanding at any point in time not to exceed the amount set forth opposite such Series 2013-1 Noteholder name on the signature pages of the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement, as such amount may be modified in accordance with the terms thereof.
	After the Conversion Date, the Series 2013-1 Note Commitment for each Series 2013-1 Noteholder shall be equal to the Series 2013-1 Note Principal Balance of the Series 2013-1 Note owned by such Series 2013-1 Noteholder.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payment
</B>
	&#148; means for each Payment Date, an amount equal to the sum, for each Series 2013-1 Advance
	outstanding for each day during the related Interest Accrual Period, of the product of (i)&nbsp;if the Alternative Rate shall then be in effect, (A)&nbsp;the principal amount of such Series 2013-1 Advance, (B)&nbsp;an interest rate equal to the sum
	of (x)&nbsp;the Base Rate in effect and (y)&nbsp;the Applicable Margin, and (C)&nbsp;1/365 or 1/366, as applicable, or (ii)&nbsp;if clause (i)&nbsp;above shall not apply, (A)&nbsp;the principal amount of such Series 2013-1 Advance, (B)&nbsp;an
	interest rate equal to the sum of (x)&nbsp;the LIBOR Rate for such Interest Accrual Period and (y)&nbsp;the Applicable Margin, and (C)&nbsp;1/360. For purposes of clarification, no Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payment shall be due (and no interest
	shall accrue hereunder) with respect to any portion of any Series 2013-1 Advance on any day during the related Interest Accrual Period on which such portion shall not actually have been funded by the applicable Series 2013-1 Noteholder (such as,
	e.g., any Affected Portion of a Series 2013-1 Advance during the applicable Affected Funding Period until actually funded by the applicable Affected Purchaser).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Note Principal Balance
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to any Series 2013-1 Note as of any date of determination, an
	amount equal to the difference of (x)&nbsp;all Series 2013-1 Advances actually made by, or on behalf of, the related Series 2013-1 Noteholder (excluding any Affected Portion that has not actually been funded), minus (y)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of
	all repayments of such Series 2013-1 Advances actually paid to the related Series 2013-1 Noteholder subsequent to the Closing Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement
</B>
	&#148; means the Amended and Restated Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement, dated as of the
	Restatement Date, among the Issuer, the Purchasers, and the Deal Agents named therein, as amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time in accordance with its terms.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	14
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage354"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Noteholder
</B>
	&#148; means, at any time of determination for the Series
	2013-1 Notes, any Person in whose name a Series 2013-1 Note is registered in the Note Register, and shall be deemed to include each Purchaser and each related CP Purchaser.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Related Documents
</B>
	&#148; means any and all of the Indenture, this Supplement, the Series 2013-1 Notes, the
	Management Agreement, the Contribution and Sale Agreement, each Container Transfer Agreement, the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement, the Administration Agreement, the Manager Transfer Facilitator Agreement, each Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge
	Agreement (upon execution thereof), each Fee Letter and any and all other agreements, documents and instruments executed and delivered by or on behalf or in support of the Issuer with respect to the issuance, sale and/or syndication of the Series
	2013-1 Notes, as any of the foregoing may from time to time be amended, modified, supplemented or renewed.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series
	2013-1 Required Overcollateralization Percentage
</B>
	&#148; means a percentage equal to (a)&nbsp;the difference of (i)&nbsp;one hundred percent (100%), minus (ii)&nbsp;the Weighted Series 2013-1 Advance Rate, plus (b)&nbsp;the Series 2013-1 Excess
	Concentration Percentage.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Required Payments
</B>
	&#148; means the following: (A)&nbsp;if neither a
	Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event nor a Series 2013-1 Event of Default is then continuing, the payments specified in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303(b)(i)
</B>
	through
<B>
	(xiii)
</B>
	, (B)&nbsp;if a Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event shall then be
	continuing but no Series 2013-1 Event of Default shall then be continuing (or a Series 2013-1 Event of Default is continuing but the Series 2013-1 Notes have not been accelerated in accordance with the Indenture), the payments set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303(c)(i)
</B>
	through
<B>
	(xvii)
</B>
	, or (C)&nbsp;if a Series 2013-1 Event of Default shall then be continuing and the Series 2013-1 Notes have been accelerated in accordance with the Indenture and such consequence shall not have been
	rescinded or annulled, the payments set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303(d)(i)
</B>
	through
<B>
	(xvi)
</B>
	. All such Series 2013-1 Required Payments shall be paid in ascending numerical order, with no payment being made to in respect of any item set forth
	in a clause having a higher numeric value until all payments outlined in any clause having a lower numeric value have been paid in full.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Restricted Cash Account
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section 302(a)
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Restricted Cash Amount
</B>
	&#148; means, as of any Payment Date, an amount equal to the product of (a)&nbsp;five
	(5), (b)&nbsp;one-twelfth, (c)&nbsp;the rate applicable pursuant to clause (i)(B) or (ii)(B) (as applicable) of the definition of &#147;Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payment&#148;, and (d)&nbsp;the Unpaid Principal Balance for Series 2013-1 as of such
	Payment Date, which Unpaid Principal Balance shall be calculated after giving effect to all advances of principal and principal payments made on such Payment Date.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</B>
	&#148; means the account of that name established in accordance with
<B>
	Section 301
</B>
	.
<B>

</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Shared Available Funds

	on any Payment Date, the portion of the Series 2013-1 Available Funds remaining after giving effect to all distributions required to be made on such Payment Date pursuant to
<B>
	Sections 303(b)(i)
</B>
	through
<B>

</B>

</B>
	,

</B>
	through
<B>

</B>
	, as the case may be.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Sharing
	Series
</B>
	&#148; means, any Series of Notes that provides for the sharing with Series 2013-1 of shared available funds for such Series of Notes.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Stated Conversion Date
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Step Up Warehouse Fee
</B>
	&#148; means, for the Series 2013-1 Notes, for each Payment Date occurring on or following the Conversion
	Date, an amount equal to the sum, for each Series 2013-1 Advance outstanding for each day during the related Interest Accrual Period, of the product of (i)&nbsp;if the Alternative Rate shall then be in effect, (A)&nbsp;the principal amount of such
	Series 2013-1 Advance, (B)&nbsp;an interest rate equal to the sum of (x)&nbsp;the Base Rate in effect and (y)&nbsp;the Step Up Warehouse Fee Percentage, and (C)&nbsp;1/365 or 1/366, as applicable and (D)&nbsp;the number of days from the prior
	Payment Date to such Payment Date, or (ii)&nbsp;if clause (i)&nbsp;above shall not apply, (A)&nbsp;the principal amount of such Series 2013-1 Advance, (B)&nbsp;an interest rate equal to the sum of (x)&nbsp;the LIBOR Rate for such Interest Accrual
	Period and (y)&nbsp;the Step Up Warehouse Fee Percentage, and (C)&nbsp;1/360 and (D)&nbsp;the number of days from the prior Payment Date to such Payment Date. For the avoidance of doubt, any Step Up Warehouse Fee that shall be due and payable on any
	Payment Date shall be considered a portion of, and not a separate fee from, the then applicable Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payment for such Payment Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Step Up Warehouse Fee Percentage
</B>
	&#148; means a percentage equal to the difference between (x)&nbsp;the Applicable Margin set
	forth in clause (B)&nbsp;in the definition thereof, minus (y)&nbsp;the Applicable Margin set forth in clause (A)&nbsp;in the definition thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>

</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;205(a)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Taxes
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>

</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Test Period
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to any Payment Date, the period of six consecutive calendar months ending on the last day
	of the calendar month immediately preceding the month in which such Payment Date occurs.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Third Party Purchased
	Container
</B>
	&#148; means any Managed Container that was originally acquired by TL from a Person that is not the OEM of such Container in a transaction that was not a Purchase Leaseback Transaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Three Month Disposition Ratio
</B>
	&#148; means the lower of the amounts set forth in clauses (a)&nbsp;and (b) below:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

<A NAME="eolPage356"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) the quotient of (i)&nbsp;the sum of all gross disposition proceeds for all Disposition Ratio
	Containers of all of TGH&#146;s Subsidiaries (collectively, &#147;
<B>
	TGH Group Disposed Containers
</B>
	&#148;) disposed of during the most recent three months (or, if fewer than 3,000 TGH Group Disposed Containers have been disposed of during such
	three month period, such longer period as is necessary to include a sample of at least 3,000 TGH Group Disposed Containers disposed) (such period, which shall be rounded to the end of the Collection Period in which the last Container in such group
	was sold, the &#147;
<B>
	TGH Disposition Measurement Period
</B>
	&#148;) over (ii)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values on the last day of the month preceding such disposition of all TGH Group Disposed Containers disposed of during the TGH Disposition
	Measurement Period; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) the quotient of (i)&nbsp;the sum of all gross disposition proceeds for all Disposition Ratio Containers of the
	Issuer (collectively, &#147;
<B>
	Issuer Disposed Containers
</B>
	&#148;) disposed of during the most recent three months (or, if fewer than 1,500 Issuer Disposed Containers have been disposed of during such three month period, such longer period as is
	necessary to include a sample of at least 1,500 Issuer Disposed Containers disposed) (such period, which shall be rounded to the end of the Collection Period in which the last Container in such group was sold, the &#147;
<B>
	TMCL IV Disposition
	Measurement Period
</B>
	&#148;) over (ii)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values on the last day of the month preceding such disposition of all Issuer Disposed Containers disposed of during the TMCL IV Disposition Measurement Period.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	TL
</B>
	&#148; means Textainer Limited, an exempted company incorporated and existing under the laws of Bermuda.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Unused Commitment
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to each Series 2013-1 Noteholder as of any date of determination, the excess of
	(i)&nbsp;the Series 2013-1 Note Commitment then in effect for such Series 2013-1 Noteholder, over (ii)&nbsp;the Series 2013-1 Note Principal Balance of the Series 2013-1 Note owned by such Series 2013-1 Noteholder as of such date of determination,
	measured after giving effect to all Series 2013-1 Advances made and all principal payments to be received by such Series 2013-1 Noteholder on such date of determination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Unused Fee
</B>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;207(f)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Unused Fee Percentage
</B>
	&#148; means as of any date of determination, one of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(x) Four hundred eighty five thousandths of one percent (0.485%) per annum, if the quotient (expressed as a percentage) obtained by dividing
	(A)&nbsp;the Aggregate Series 2013-1 Note Principal Balance by (B)&nbsp;the Aggregate Series 2013-1 Note Commitments is less than fifty percent (50%)&nbsp;as of such date of determination; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(y) If the circumstances in the foregoing clause (x)&nbsp;are not applicable as of any such date of determination, four tenths of one percent
	(0.40%) per annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Weighted Series 2013-1 Advance Rate
</B>
	&#148; means as of any date of determination, an amount equal to the
	sum of:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(A) an amount equal to the product of:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	a fraction,

</TD>

	the numerator of which is an amount equal to the sum of (1)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all OEM Containers and Third Party Purchased Containers; and (2)&nbsp;an amount equal to the lesser of:

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the sum of the Net Book Values of all Purchase Leaseback Containers; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	an amount equal to the product of twenty percent (20%)&nbsp;and the Aggregate Net Book Value, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the denominator of which is equal to the Aggregate Net Book Value; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(B) an amount equal to
	the product of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Clause B Advance Rate (as such term is defined in the definition of Series 2013-1 Advance Rate); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a fraction,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the numerator of which is an amount by which (1)&nbsp;the sum of the Net Book Values of all Purchase Leaseback Containers exceeds (2)&nbsp;an amount equal to the product of twenty percent (20%)&nbsp;of the Aggregate Net
	Book Value; provided however, that such amount may not exceed an amount equal to the product of twenty percent (20%)&nbsp;of the Aggregate Net Book Value; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the denominator of which is equal to the Aggregate Net Book Value.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) Capitalized terms used
	herein and not otherwise defined shall have the meaning set forth in the Indenture or, if not defined therein, as defined in the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) References in this Supplement and any other Series 2013-1 Related Document to any section of the Uniform Commercial Code or the UCC shall
	mean, on or after the effective date of adoption of any revision to the Uniform Commercial Code or the UCC in the applicable jurisdiction, such revised or successor section thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

<A NAME="eolPage358"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE II
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	Creation of the Series 2013-1 Notes
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;201.
<U>
	Designation
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) There is hereby created a Series of Notes to be issued in one Class pursuant to the Indenture and this Supplement to be known respectively
	as &#147;Textainer Marine Containers IV Limited Asset-Backed Notes, Series 2013-1&#148;. The Series 2013-1 Notes were issued on the Issuance Date in the initial maximum principal balance of Three Hundred Million Dollars ($300,000,000). The Series
	2013-1 Notes are being issued in a single Class. All of the Series 2013-1 Notes are Senior Notes and each Series 2013-1 Note will be equally entitled to payments owing by the Issuer to the Series 2013-1 Noteholders pursuant to the terms of this
	Supplement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) Payments of principal and interest on the Series 2013-1 Notes shall be payable from funds on deposit in the Series 2013-1
	Series Account at the times and in the amounts set forth in Article III of the Indenture and Article III of this Supplement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) Each
	Series 2013-1 Note is classified as a &#147;Warehouse Note&#148; (as such term is defined in the Indenture).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) The Series 2013-1 Notes
	will not be rated on the Closing Date by any Rating Agency.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) Each of the following terms defined in the Indenture shall have the
	following meanings with respect to the Series 2013-1 Notes:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) The &#147;Advance Rate&#148; (as defined in the Indenture)
	for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series 2013-1 Advance Rate&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) The
	&#147;Asset Base&#148; (as defined in the Indenture) for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series 2013-1 Asset Base&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) The &#147;Excess Concentration Percentage&#148; (as defined in the Indenture) for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series
	2013-1 Excess Concentration Percentage&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) There is no &#147;Expected Final
	Payment Date&#148; (as defined in the Indenture) for Series 2013-1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) The &#147;Interest Payment&#148; (as defined in
	the Indenture) for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payment&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi) The &#147;Legal Final Payment Date&#148; (as defined in the Indenture) for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series 2013-1
	Legal Final Payment Date&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	19
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Series 2013-1 shall be the Closing Date.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	in the Indenture, shall be the Series 2013-1 Related Documents (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Account&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xiv) The &#147;Series-Specific Collateral&#148; (as defined in the
	Indenture) for Series 2013-1 shall be the &#147;Series 2013-1 Series-Specific Collateral&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;101(a)).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
