<A NAME="eolPage379"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	(xv) To the Director Services Provider an amount equal to the product of
	(A)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (B)&nbsp;any unpaid indemnification amounts owing pursuant to the Director Services Agreement;
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	(xvi) To each of the following on a
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	basis: (A)&nbsp;to the Issuer, an amount equal to the product of
	(i)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (ii)&nbsp;the amount of any indemnity payments payable to the officers, directors and/or managers of the Issuer required to be made by the Issuer, and (B)&nbsp;to the Manager, an amount
	equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (ii)&nbsp;the amount of any officer and director indemnity payments required to be made by the Manager;
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(xvii) To the Series Accounts of each other Series, all remaining Series 2013-1 Available Funds to be allocated to such
	other Series of Notes in accordance with
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304
</B>
	; and
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(xviii) The remainder to the Excess Funding
	Account (for, at Issuer&#146;s option, retention therein or, while no Trust Event of Default or Asset Base Deficiency is continuing or would result therefrom, further distribution).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(e) Any amounts payable to a Series 2013-1 Noteholder pursuant to this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303
</B>
	shall be made by wire transfer of
	immediately available funds to the account that such Series 2013-1 Noteholder has designated to the Indenture Trustee in writing at least five (5)&nbsp;Business Days prior to the applicable Payment Date. Any amounts payable by the Issuer hereunder
	are contingent upon the availability of funds to make such payment in accordance with the provisions of this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303
</B>
	and, to the extent such funds are not available, shall not constitute a &#147;Claim&#148; (as defined in
	Section&nbsp;101(5) of the Bankruptcy Code) against the Issuer in any bankruptcy, reorganization, arrangement, insolvency or liquidation proceedings involving the Issuer in the event that such amounts are not paid in accordance with this
<B>
	Section
	303
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;304.
<U>
	Allocation of Series 2013-1 Shared Available Funds
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(a) All Series 2013-1 Shared Available Funds that are available for distribution to other Series of Notes in accordance with the
	provisions of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;303
</B>
	shall be allocated by the Manager to each Series of Notes then Outstanding that is a Sharing Series (other than (i)&nbsp;the Series 2013-1 Notes and (ii)&nbsp;Liquidation Deficiency Series) that have a Required
	Payment Deficiency on such Determination Date. Allocation of Series 2013-1 Shared Available Funds to Liquidation Deficiency Series shall be made in accordance with
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304(b)
</B>
	and only after all distributions shall have been made
	pursuant to this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304(a)
</B>
	. Allocations shall be made to each such Series having a Required Payment Deficiency in accordance with the following order of priorities, with no payment being made at any level of priority until all prior
	priorities have been paid in full:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	First
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full the Indenture Trustee Fees and expenses
	payable by, or allocable to, such Series, the amount of such unpaid Indenture Trustee Fees and expenses;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	40
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage380"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Second
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full the fees of the Director Services
	Provider payable by, or allocation to, such Series, the amount of such unpaid fees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Third
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in
	full the Management Fee and Management Fee Arrearages payable by, or allocable to, such Series, the amount of such unpaid Management Fee and Management Fee Arrearages;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fourth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full the Manager Advances payable by, or allocable to, such Series, the amount of such
	unpaid Manager Advances;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fifth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full the Back-up Management Fees, Manager Transfer Facilitator
	Fees and expenses of the Manager Transfer Facilitator payable by, or allocable to, such Series, the amount of such unpaid Back-up Management Fees, Manager Transfer Facilitator Fees and expenses of the Manager Transfer Facilitator;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Sixth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full the Issuer Expenses payable by, or allocable to, such Series, the amount of such unpaid
	Issuer Expenses;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Seventh
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all interest payments (excluding Default Interest) payable with
	respect to the Senior Notes of such Series and all commitment fees payable with respect to the Senior Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid interest payments and commitment fees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Eighth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all regularly scheduled payments (excluding termination payments) owing to each
	Interest Rate Hedge Counterparty that has entered into an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement with respect to (or allocable to) the Senior Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid regularly scheduled payments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Ninth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all interest payments (excluding Default Interest) payable with respect to the
	Subordinate Notes of such Series and all commitment fees payable with respect to the Subordinate Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid interest payments and commitment fees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Tenth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all Minimum Principal Payment Amounts for the Senior Notes of such Series, the amount
	of such unpaid Minimum Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Eleventh
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all Scheduled Principal
	Payment Amounts for the Senior Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Twelfth
</U>
	, to
	each Series that has not paid in full all Supplemental Principal Payment Amounts for the Senior Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid Supplemental Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Thirteenth
</U>
	, to each Series containing Senior Notes that have been accelerated but not paid in full, all principal amounts owing to the
	Holders of the Senior Notes of such Series.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	41
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage381"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fourteenth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all regularly scheduled payments
	(excluding termination payments) owing to each Interest Rate Hedge Counterparty that has entered into an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement with respect to (or allocable to) the Subordinate Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid regularly
	scheduled payments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fifteenth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all Minimum Principal Payment Amounts for the Subordinate
	Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid Minimum Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Sixteenth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in
	full all Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts for the Subordinate Notes of such Series, the amount of such unpaid Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Seventeenth
</U>
	, to each Series that has not paid in full all Supplemental Principal Payment Amounts for the Subordinate Notes of such
	Series, the amount of such unpaid Supplemental Principal Payment Amounts; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Eighteenth
</U>
	, to each Series containing Subordinate
	Notes that have been accelerated but not been paid in full, all principal amounts owing to the Holders of the Subordinate Notes of such Series.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	If
	more than one Series shall be entitled to a distribution pursuant to a particular priority set forth in
<I>
</I>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304(a)
</B>
<I>
</I>
	, funds shall be allocated among each such entitled Series on a
<I>
	pro rata basis
</I>
	based on the
	relative amount owing to each such Series pursuant to such payment priority.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) After the application of the allocation set forth
	in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304(a)
</B>
	, any remaining Series 2013-1 Shared Available Funds shall be allocated in accordance with the following order of priorities, with no payment being made at any level of priority until all prior priorities have been paid
	in full:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	First
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full the Indenture Trustee Fees and expenses payable
	by, or allocable to, such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Indenture Trustee Fees and expenses;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Second
</U>
	, to
	each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full the fees of the Director Services Provider payable by, or allocation to, such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid fees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Third
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full the Management Fee and Management Fee Arrearages payable by, or
	allocable to, such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Management Fee and Management Fee Arrearages;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fourth
</U>
	,
	to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full the Manager Advances payable by, or allocable to, such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Manager Advances;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	42
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage382"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fifth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full the Back-up
	Management Fees, Manager Transfer Facilitator Fees and expenses of the Manager Transfer Facilitator payable by, or allocable to, such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Back-up Management Fees, Manager Transfer Facilitator Fees
	and expenses of the Manager Transfer Facilitator;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Sixth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full all
	interest payments (excluding Default Interest) and commitment fees payable with respect to the Senior Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid interest payments and commitment fees to the Senior Notes of such Series;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Seventh
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full all regularly scheduled payments (excluding termination
	payments) owing to each Interest Rate Hedge Counterparty that has entered into an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement with respect to (or allocable to) the Senior Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid regularly scheduled
	payments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Eighth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full all Minimum Principal Payment Amounts to the
	Senior Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Minimum Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Ninth
</U>
	, to each
	Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, all Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts to the Senior Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Tenth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, the Unpaid Principal Balance of the Senior Notes of such
	Liquidation Deficiency Series, the Unpaid Principal Balance of such Senior Notes;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Eleventh
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series
	that has not paid in full, all termination and all other payments owing to each Interest Rate Hedge Counterparty that has entered into an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement with respect to (or allocable to) the Senior Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency
	Series, the amount of such unpaid termination and other payments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Twelfth
</U>
	, to each Series containing Senior Notes that have been
	accelerated but not paid in full, all principal amounts owing to the Holders of the Servicer Notes of such Series.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Thirteenth
</U>
	, to
	each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, all interest payments (excluding Default Interest) and commitment fees payable with respect to the Subordinate Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid
	interest payments and commitment fees;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fourteenth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, all regularly
	scheduled payments (excluding termination payments) owing to each Interest Rate Hedge Counterparty that has entered into an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement with respect to (or allocable to) the Subordinate Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series,
	the amount of such unpaid regularly scheduled payments;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	43
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage383"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Fifteenth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, all Minimum
	Principal Payment Amounts to the Subordinate Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Minimum Principal Payment Amounts;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Sixteenth
</U>
	, to each Liquidation Deficiency Series that has not paid in full, all Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts to the Subordinate
	Notes of such Liquidation Deficiency Series, the amount of such unpaid Scheduled Principal Payment Amounts; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Seventeenth
</U>
	, to
	each Series containing Subordinate Notes that have been accelerated but not been paid in full, all principal amounts owing to the Holders of the Subordinate Notes of such Series.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If more than one Liquidation Deficiency Series shall be entitled to a distribution pursuant to a particular priority set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;304(b)
</B>
	, funds shall be allocated among each such entitled Liquidation Deficiency Series on a
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
	basis based on the relative amount owing to each such Liquidation Deficiency Series pursuant to such payment priority.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE IV
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	Series-Specific Early Amortization Events, Manager Defaults, Events of Default and Covenants for the Series 2013-1 Notes
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;401.
<U>
	Series-Specific Early Amortization Events
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Each of the following events or conditions shall constitute a &#147;
<B>
	Series-Specific Early Amortization Event
</B>
	&#148; for Series
	2013-1:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) The occurrence and continuance of a Series-Specific Event of Default;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) As of any date of determination, the EBIT Ratio shall be less than 1.25 to 1.0;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) As of any Payment Date, the Disposition Ratio set forth in either paragraph (a)&nbsp;or paragraph (b)&nbsp;of the
	definition thereof shall be less than 1.00 to 1.00;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(iv) (A) a breach of any financial covenant of TGH set forth in
	the documents governing any Indebtedness of TGH in an aggregate principal amount of $10,000,000 or greater (the &#147;
<B>
	Funded Debt Documents
</B>
	&#148;) shall have occurred and shall not have been permanently waived within sixty (60)&nbsp;days
	thereafter by the applicable lenders, or (B)&nbsp;any default, not described in clause (A), under any Funded Debt Document shall have occurred and as a result the required lenders under the affected financing transaction have accelerated all or part
	of such Indebtedness;
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) The Issuer shall (A)&nbsp;engage in a Restricted Issuance, or (B)&nbsp;amend the Series
	2013-1 Notes subsequent to the Restatement Date in a manner such that
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	44
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage384"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the Series 2013-1 Notes would constitute a Restricted Issuance or (C)&nbsp;consent to an action by a Series 2013-1 Noteholder or any member of its Related Group contemplated in
	Section&nbsp;4.2(f) of the Series 2013-1 Note Purchase Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vi) As of any Payment Date, the Unpaid Principal
	Balance for Series 2013-1 shall exceed the Series 2013-1 Asset Base, and such condition continues unremedied for a period of ten (10)&nbsp;consecutive days; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(vii) The Stated Conversion Date occurs and is not extended by all of the Series 2013-1 Noteholders.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) The Series-Specific Early Amortization Event described in Section&nbsp;401(a)(ii) shall be deemed no longer to be continuing, if such
	condition does not exist on any two consecutive subsequent Payment Dates, immediately upon such second consecutive Payment Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) The
	Series-Specific Early Amortization Event described in Section&nbsp;401(a)(iv) shall be deemed to be no longer continuing if such breach or default is cured or waived, within sixty (60)&nbsp;days of the date of the initial occurrence of such breach
	or default under the Funded Debt Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(d) If a Series-Specific Early Amortization Event not otherwise addressed in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;401(b)
</B>
	or
<B>
	(c)
</B>
	&nbsp;exists on any Payment Date, then such Series-Specific Early Amortization Event shall be deemed to continue until the Business Day on which the Control Party waives, in writing, such Series-Specific Early
	Amortization Event. The Indenture Trustee shall promptly provide notice of any such waiver to each Rating Agency for the Series 2013-1 Notes.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) The occurrence of a Series-Specific Early Amortization Event will not in and of itself result in the occurrence of a Trust Early
	Amortization Event or a Series-Specific Early Amortization Event for any other Series.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f) So long as a Series 2013-1 Early Amortization
	Event is continuing, the Indenture Trustee shall have in addition to the rights provided in the Series 2013-1 Related Documents, all rights and remedies provided under all applicable laws.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;402.
<U>
	Series-Specific Manager Defaults
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Each of the following events or conditions shall constitute a &#147;
<B>
	Series-Specific Manager Default
</B>
	&#148; for Series 2013-1:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) The Leverage Ratio of TGH shall exceed 4.0 to 1.0 as of the end of any fiscal year.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) Any event described in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;401(a)(iv)
</B>
	shall have occurred and such event shall not have been rescinded or
	waived within sixty (60)&nbsp;days thereafter by the holders of the applicable indebtedness;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that, in the event that the Funded Debt Documents shall have lapsed or been terminated, the financial covenants of TGH set forth therein (as
	in effect immediately prior to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	45
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage385"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	such lapse or termination) shall survive for purposes of this definition, unless waived by the Control Party, until new Funded Debt Documents have been entered into.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(b) The Control Party may waive any Series-Specific Manager Default and may amend or consent to any amendment of
<B>
	Section
	402(a)
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;403.
<U>
	Series-Specific Events of Default
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Each of the following shall constitute a &#147;
<B>
	Series-Specific Event of Default
</B>
	&#148; for Series 2013-1:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) The Issuer shall fail to pay (1)&nbsp;on any Payment Date, the full amount of the Series 2013-1 Note Interest Payments then
	due, or (2)&nbsp;on the Legal Final Payment Date, the then Unpaid Principal Balance for Series 2013-1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(ii) The
	Issuer shall fail to pay, within three (3)&nbsp;Business Days after when due, any amounts owing to the Series 2013-1 Noteholders (unless constituting a Trust Event of Default or a Series-Specific Event of Default under
<B>
	Section 403(a)(i)
</B>
	).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(iii) There shall occur any breach of any covenant of the Issuer or any Seller in any Series 2013-1 Related
	Document, which breach (1)&nbsp;materially and adversely affects the interest of any Series 2013-1 Noteholder and (2)&nbsp;continues for a period of 60 days (subject to an additional 60-day cure period for defaults that the Issuer or any Seller is
	diligently attempting to cure), in each case, unless such breach constitutes a Trust Event of Default or a Series-Specific Event of Default under
<B>
	Section&nbsp;403(a)(i)
</B>
	or
<B>
	(ii)
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) Any representation or warranty of the Issuer or any Seller made in any Series 2013-1 Related Document shall prove to be
	incorrect in any material respect as of the time when the same shall have been made, which incorrectness (1)&nbsp;materially and adversely affects the interest of any Series 2013-1 Noteholder, and (2)&nbsp;if capable of cure, continues for a period
	of 30 days (subject to an additional 30-day cure period for defaults that the Issuer or any Seller is diligently attempting to cure).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(v) The Indenture Trustee shall fail to have a first priority perfected security interest in the Series 2013-1 Series-Specific
	Collateral.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) Upon the occurrence and during the continuance of a Series-Specific Event of Default, the Control Party may
	(i)&nbsp;declare the Series 2013-1 Notes to be immediately due and payable, (ii)&nbsp;institute judicial proceedings for collection, (iii)&nbsp;direct a partial sale of Managed Containers and related Leases included in the Collateral in accordance
	with Section&nbsp;804(b) of the Indenture, and (iv)&nbsp;exercise remedies with respect to the Series 2013-1 Series-Specific Collateral.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	46
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage386"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) The Control Party may waive any Series-Specific Event of Default and may amend or consent to
	any amendment of
<B>
	Section 403(a)
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) The Control Party may waive a Series-Specific Event of Default for Series 2013-1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;404.
<U>
	Series-Specific Management Fees
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(a) As contemplated by the Management Agreement, the Manager shall be entitled to a management fee for each Collection Period equal to
	the sum of the amounts set forth in clauses (i), (ii), (iii)&nbsp;and (iv)&nbsp;below (such sum, the &#147;
<B>
	Series 2013-1 Management Fee
</B>
	&#148;):
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(i) A &#147;
<B>
	Master Lease Management Fee
</B>
	&#148;, in an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the product of
	(A)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (B)&nbsp;NOI (as defined in the Management Agreement) for the Master Lease Fleet (as defined in the Management Agreement) for such Collection Period (as defined in the Management
	Agreement), multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;eleven percent (11.0%).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(ii) A &#147;
<B>
	Long-Term/PLB Management
	Fee
</B>
	&#148;, in an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the product of (A)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (B)&nbsp;the sum of the NOI (as defined in the Management Agreement) for such Collection Period (as defined in
	the Management Agreement) of (x)&nbsp;the Long-Term Lease Fleet (as defined in the Management Agreement) plus (y)&nbsp;any Managed Containers (as defined in the Management Agreement) then subject to purchase-leasebacks, multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;eight
	percent (8.0%).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(iii) A &#147;
<B>
	Finance Lease Management Fee
</B>
	&#148;, in an amount equal to the product
	of (i)&nbsp;the product of (A)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (B)&nbsp;the Finance Lease Payments (excluding any payments relating to Managed Containers then subject to purchase-leasebacks) (as defined in the Management
	Agreement), multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;two percent (2.0%).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(iv)&nbsp;A &#147;
<B>
	Sale Management Fee
</B>
	&#148;,
	in an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the product of (A)&nbsp;the Asset Allocation Percentage for Series 2013-1 and (B)&nbsp;the Sales Proceeds from the sale or other disposition of any Managed Container during such Collection Period (except
	for any sale or disposition (x)&nbsp;to Manager or any Affiliate of Manager, (y)&nbsp;pursuant to the exercise of a purchase option contained in a Lease, or (z)&nbsp;that is due to a Casualty Loss) (as defined in the Management Agreement),
	multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;either (A)&nbsp;if the last day of such Collection Period occurs during a Failed Test Period, zero, or (B)&nbsp;at all times not covered by clause (A)&nbsp;five percent (5.0%).
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;405.
<U>
	Additional Covenants
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition to the covenants set forth in Article VI of the Indenture, the Issuer hereby makes the following additional covenants for the
	benefit of the Series 2013-1 Noteholders:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	47
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage387"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<U>
	Rule 144A
</U>
	. So long as any of the Series 2013-1 Notes are &#147;restricted
	securities&#148; within the meaning of Rule 144(a)(3) under the Securities Act, Issuer shall, unless it becomes subject to and complies with the reporting requirements of Section&nbsp;13 or 15(d) of the Exchange Act, or rule 12g3-2(b) thereunder,
	(i)&nbsp;provide to any Series 2013-1 Noteholder of such restricted securities, or to any prospective Series 2013-1 Noteholder of such restricted securities designated by a Series 2013-1 Noteholder, upon the request of such Series 2013-1 Noteholder
	or prospective Series 2013-1 Noteholder, any information required to be provided by Rule 144A(d)(4) under the Securities Act and (ii)&nbsp;update such information to prevent such information from becoming materially false and materially misleading
	in a manner adverse to any Series 2013-1 Noteholder.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<U>
	Use of Proceeds
</U>
	. The proceeds from the issuance of the Series 2013-1
	Notes shall be used as follows: (i)&nbsp;to fund the acquisition by the Issuer of containers and other items of Collateral, (ii)&nbsp;making deposits into the Trust Account, the Series 2013-1 Restricted Cash Account and the Series 2013-1 Series
	Account, (iii)&nbsp;paying the costs of issuance of the Series 2013-1 Notes and of the negotiation, preparation and execution of the Series 2013-1 Related Documents and (iv)&nbsp;for other general corporate purposes permitted under the operating
	agreement of the Issuer, as contemplated in Section&nbsp;624 of the Indenture.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<U>
	Perfection Requirements
</U>
	. The Issuer will not
	(a)&nbsp;change any of (i)&nbsp;its corporate name or the location of its place of business or, its chief executive office or (ii)&nbsp;the name under which it does business, or (b)&nbsp;amend any provision of its memorandum of association or
	bye-laws, or (c)&nbsp;become organized under the laws of any other jurisdiction, in each case, without the prior written consent of the Control Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)
<U>
	Consent to Series Issuance
</U>
	. The Issuer shall not issue any additional Series of Notes after the Restatement Date without obtaining
	the prior written consent of the Control Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)
<U>
	Consent to Issuance of Subordinate Notes; Consent to Additional Senior Notes
</U>
	.
	The Issuer shall not issue any Subordinate Notes pursuant to this Supplement without obtaining, in each instance, the prior written consent of all of the Series 2013-1 Noteholders. The Issuer shall not issue after the Restatement Date any additional
	Senior Notes pursuant to the terms of this Supplement without obtaining, in each instance, the prior written consent of Series 2013-1 Noteholders representing more than sixty six and two thirds of one percent
	(66
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	&nbsp;2
</SUP>
	&#8260;
<SUB STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM">
	3
</SUB>
	%)&nbsp;of the Aggregate Series 2013-1 Commitment Amount (or, if the Conversion Date has occurred, the then Unpaid Principal Balance for Series 2013-1.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section&nbsp;406.
<U>
	Interest Rate Hedge Agreements for Series 2013-1
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Upon the earliest to occur of (w)&nbsp;the Conversion Date, (x)&nbsp;the first day after the date on which one month LIBOR (as determined
	by the Indenture Trustee in accordance with its standard practices) shall exceed or equal two percent (2.00%), (y)&nbsp;the first day after the date on which the 2-year swap rate (as set forth in The Wall Street Journal) shall equal or exceed three
	percent (3.00%), and (z)&nbsp;the date on which an Event of Default, Early Amortization Event or Manager Default has occurred, the Issuer shall (or shall cause the Manager on its behalf), to the extent commercially practicable, enter into and
	maintain transactions under Interest Rate
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	Hedge Agreements with respect to the Series 2013-1 Notes in accordance with
<I>
</I>
<B>
	Exhibit C
</B>
<I>
</I>
	;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	that, except with respect to the initial entry by the Issuer into
	the required Interest Rate Hedge Agreements under the preceding
<I>
</I>
<B>
	clause (z)
</B>
<I>
</I>
	&nbsp;(if such clause is applicable), so long as an Early Amortization Event or an Event of Default is continuing, neither the Issuer (nor the Manager on
	its behalf) shall enter into any additional transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements other than by terminating existing transactions or by entering into reverse or mirror swap transactions;
<I>
	provided, further
</I>
	, that the Interest Rate
	Hedge Agreements related to Long-Term Leases and Finance Leases allocated to the Series 2013-1 Asset Base must have a weighted average tenor of no less than one year less than the then weighted average remaining term of the applicable Long-Term
	Leases and Finance Leases.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(b) In the event that the application of the formulas set forth in
<B>
	Exhibit C
</B>
	indicates
	that either (i)&nbsp;the Issuer is required to enter into additional transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements, with a total notional balance in excess of Ten Million Dollars ($10,000,000) or (ii)&nbsp;the aggregate notional balance of all
	outstanding transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements then in effect exceeds the aggregate required notional amount (as determined by application of the formulas set forth in
<B>
	Exhibit C
</B>
	) by the lesser of (A)&nbsp;Twenty Million Dollars
	($20,000,000) or (B)&nbsp;the then Unpaid Principal Balance for Series 2013-1, then the Issuer shall provide notice of such event the Indenture Trustee, the Administrative Agent and each Interest Rate Hedge Provider for Series 2013-1 within five
	(5)&nbsp;Business Days after such condition is determined to exist. The Issuer (or the Manager on behalf of the Issuer) shall within thirty (30)&nbsp;days after the date on which such condition is determined to exist, remedy such imbalance
	(x)&nbsp;under circumstances described in the preceding
<B>
	clause (i)
</B>
	, by entering into one or more transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements for Series 2013-1 in order to comply with the requirements of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(a)
</B>
	and
	not exceed such requirements by more than the amounts set forth in
<B>
	clause (ii)
</B>
	&nbsp;above, or (y)&nbsp;under circumstances described in the preceding clause (ii)&nbsp;by terminating transactions for all, or a portion, of one or more
	transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements for Series 2013-1 then in effect so that the remaining notional amounts for all future calculation periods under all transactions outstanding under the Interest Rate Hedge Agreements then in effect
	for Series 2013-1 shall comply with the requirements of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(a)
</B>
	and not exceed such requirements by more than the amounts set forth in
<B>
	clause (ii)
</B>
	&nbsp;above. The calculations to be made under this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(b)
</B>
	shall exclude all interest rate transactions where the Issuer is not required to make any scheduled periodic payments other than premium payments or fees that have been paid in full, and the Net Book Value of the
	containers hedged by such transactions. So long as no Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event or Series 2013-1 Event of Default is then continuing, the Issuer (or the Manager on its behalf) may exercise its discretion in selecting the specific
	transactions and notional amounts thereof to be terminated or reverse or mirror swapped. If a Series 2013-1 Early Amortization Event or Series 2013-1 Event of Default is then continuing, termination or reverse or mirror swaps shall be effected over
	all outstanding transactions under Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreements on a
<B>
</B>
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
<B>
</B>
	basis, based on the respective notional amounts for each remaining calculation period, so that the remaining notional amounts for each
	remaining calculation period will comply with the requirements of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(a)
</B>
	and not exceed the amounts set forth in
<B>
	Section 406(b)(ii)
</B>
	.
<B>
</B>
</P>

	required under
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(b)
</B>
	within the
<B>
</B>

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	30 day time period provided in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(b)
</B>
	, the Control Party (A)&nbsp;will have the right, in its sole discretion, to direct the Indenture Trustee to enter into additional
	transactions under Interest Rate Hedge Agreements for Series 2013-1 on the Issuer&#146;s behalf in order to comply with the requirements of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(a)
</B>
	or (B)&nbsp;within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after the thirty (30)&nbsp;day
	period provided in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(b)
</B>
	will have the right, in its sole discretion, to direct the Indenture Trustee to terminate or reverse or mirror swap, in whole or in part, all outstanding transactions under Series 2013-1 Interest Rate
	Hedge Agreements on a
<B>
</B>
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
<B>
</B>
	basis, based on the respective notional amounts for each remaining calculation period, so that the remaining notional amounts for each remaining calculation period will comply with the requirements
	of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(a)
</B>
	and not exceed the amounts set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(b)(ii)
</B>
	. In the event the Control Party directs the Indenture Trustee to enter into a Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement on the Issuer&#146;s
	behalf, the Control Party shall promptly send a copy of any such agreement to the Issuer and may provide the Indenture Trustee and Manager with a written direction to deposit in the Series 2013-1 Series Account certain amounts to purchase, or
	reimburse the Control Party or a third-party for purchasing, such Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement. All payments received from an Interest Rate Hedge Provider shall be deposited by the Issuer directly into the Series 2013-1 Series
	Account.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(d) With respect to any transaction which is to be terminated in accordance with the terms of this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406
</B>
	, the Issuer (or the Manager or Control Party) will give the Interest Rate Hedge Provider not less than three (3)&nbsp;Business Days notice of such termination, specifying the relevant transaction, the notional amount thereof
	to be terminated for each remaining calculation period and the effective date of such termination. An &#147;Additional Termination Event&#148; and an &#147;Early Termination Date&#148; (as such terms are used in the 1992 ISDA Master Agreement
	Multicurrency&#150;Cross Border form agreement) shall be deemed to have occurred under the transaction on the specified termination date with respect to the notional amounts so terminated. For purposes of such Early Termination Date and
	Section&nbsp;6(e) of the applicable Interest Rate Hedge Agreement, the &#147;Terminated Transaction&#148; shall be only that portion relating to the terminated notional amounts and the remainder of the transaction will continue in full force and
	effect and the Issuer will be the &#147;Affected Party&#148; for purposes of such termination. The amount payable under Section&nbsp;6(e) of the applicable Interest Rate Hedge Agreement shall be determined by the Interest Rate Hedge Provider and
	shall be due and payable in accordance with the terms of such Section&nbsp;6(e), provided that &#147;Market Quotation&#148; under the Interest Rate Hedge Agreement shall be determined on the basis of the quotation of one Reference Market-maker
	selected by the Interest Rate Hedge Provider, which may be such Interest Rate Hedge Provider to the extent its quotation is reasonably determined in good faith. The provisions of this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406(d)
</B>
	shall be incorporated by reference in
	each Interest Rate Hedge Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) The Issuer shall enter into each Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement only with an
	Eligible Interest Rate Hedge Provider. Each Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement shall provide that if the Eligible Interest Rate Hedge Provider or any party providing credit support on its behalf suffers an Interest Rate Hedge Provider
	Required Rating Downgrade Event, such Interest Rate Hedge Provider will be required (i)&nbsp;to post, within ten (10)&nbsp;Business Days (or such other period of time as may be set forth in the related Interest Rate Hedge Agreement not to exceed
	thirty (30)&nbsp;days) after such Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Downgrade Event, collateral set forth in the applicable Interest Rate Hedge
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	50
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage390"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Agreement and execute a credit support annex in connection therewith or (ii)&nbsp;otherwise remedy such Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Downgrade Event in accordance with the terms
	of the related Interest Rate Hedge Agreement. Failure to post collateral or so otherwise remedy such Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Downgrade Event within the applicable period of time shall constitute a termination event under the
	terms of the applicable Interest Rate Hedge Agreement. Such Interest Rate Hedge Provider may transfer (at its own cost), with the cooperation of the Issuer and the Manager, all of its rights and obligations under its Interest Rate Hedge Agreement to
	an Eligible Interest Rate Hedge Provider in accordance with the terms of its Interest Rate Hedge Agreement. Each Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement shall also provide that if the Interest Rate Hedge Provider (or any party providing credit
	support identified in the Interest Rate Hedge Agreement or any credit support annex thereto on its behalf) suffers an Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Replacement Event, such Interest Rate Hedge Provider will be required to transfer (at
	its own cost) all of its rights and obligations under its Interest Rate Hedge Agreement to an Eligible Interest Rate Hedge Provider not later than thirty (30)&nbsp;Business Days (or such other period of time as may be set forth in the related
	Interest Rate Hedge Agreement) after the occurrence of the Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Replacement Event. The Issuer may terminate a Series 2013-1 Interest Rate Hedge Agreement and simultaneously enter into a replacement Interest
	Rate Hedge Agreement in the event an Interest Rate Hedge Provider fails to post collateral or transfer its rights and interests under an Interest Rate Hedge Agreement in accordance with the terms of the Interest Rate Hedge Agreement as required in
	relation to an Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Downgrade Event or an Interest Rate Hedge Provider Required Rating Replacement Event, as applicable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
</B>
	(f) All of the Interest Rate Hedge Agreements entered into pursuant to this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;406
</B>
	shall be allocable to the Series
	2013-1 Notes.
